00068 /*
00069  * Skeleton generation algorithm based on: 
00070  * "Harmonic Skeleton for Realistic Character Animation"
00071  * Gregoire Aujay, Franck Hetroy, Francis Lazarus and Christine Depraz
00072  * SIGGRAPH 2007
00073  * 
00074  * Reeb graph generation algorithm based on: 
00075  * "Robust On-line Computation of Reeb Graphs: Simplicity and Speed"
00076  * Valerio Pascucci, Giorgio Scorzelli, Peer-Timo Bremer and Ajith Mascarenhas
00077  * SIGGRAPH 2007
00078  * 
00079  * */
00080

00082 #define DEBUG_REEB_NODE

00119 static VertexData *allocVertexData(EditMesh *em)
00120 {
00121     VertexData *data;
00122     EditVert *eve;
00123     int totvert, index;
00124     
00125     totvert = BLI_countlist(&em->verts);

00127     data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(VertexData) * totvert, "VertexData");
00128

00131         data[index].i = index;
00132         data[index].w = 0;
00133         eve->tmp.p = data + index;
00134     }
00135

00137 }

00166 void REEB_freeArc(BArc *barc)
00167 {
00168     ReebArc *arc = (ReebArc*)barc;
00169     BLI_freelistN(&arc->edges);
00170     
00171     if (arc->buckets)
00172         MEM_freeN(arc->buckets);
00173         
00174     if (arc->faces)
00175         BLI_ghash_free(arc->faces, NULL, NULL);
00176     
00177     MEM_freeN(arc);
00178 }
00179 
00180 void REEB_freeGraph(ReebGraph *rg)
00181 {
00182     ReebArc *arc;
00183     ReebNode *node;
00184     
00185     // free nodes
00186     for ( node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = node->next )
00187     {
00188         BLI_freeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)node);
00189     }
00190     BLI_freelistN(&rg->nodes);
00191     
00192     // free arcs
00193     arc = rg->arcs.first;
00194     while ( arc )
00195     {
00196         ReebArc *next = arc->next;
00197         REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc);
00198         arc = next;
00199     }
00200     
00201     // free edge map
00202     BLI_edgehash_free(rg->emap, NULL);
00203     
00204     /* free linked graph */
00205     if (rg->link_up)
00206     {
00207         REEB_freeGraph(rg->link_up);
00208     }
00209     
00210     MEM_freeN(rg);
00211 }
00212 
00213 ReebGraph * newReebGraph(void)
00214 {
00215     ReebGraph *rg;
00216     rg = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ReebGraph), "reeb graph");
00217     
00218     rg->totnodes = 0;
00219     rg->emap = BLI_edgehash_new();
00220     
00221     
00222     rg->free_arc = REEB_freeArc;
00223     rg->free_node = NULL;
00224     rg->radial_symmetry = REEB_RadialSymmetry;
00225     rg->axial_symmetry = REEB_AxialSymmetry;
00226     
00227     return rg;
00228 }

00264 static ReebNode * copyNode(ReebGraph *rg, ReebNode *node)
00265 {
00266     ReebNode *cp_node = NULL;
00267     
00268     cp_node = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ReebNode), "reeb node copy");
00269     
00270     memcpy(cp_node, node, sizeof(ReebNode));
00271     
00272     cp_node->prev = NULL;
00273     cp_node->next = NULL;
00274     cp_node->arcs = NULL;
00275     
00276     cp_node->link_up = NULL;
00277     cp_node->link_down = NULL;
00278     
00279     BLI_addtail(&rg->nodes, cp_node);
00280     rg->totnodes++;
00281     
00282     return cp_node; 
00283 }

00285 static void relinkNodes(ReebGraph *low_rg, ReebGraph *high_rg)
00286 {
00287     ReebNode *low_node, *high_node;
00288     
00289     if (low_rg == NULL || high_rg == NULL)
00290     {
00291         return;
00292     }
00293     
00294     for (low_node = low_rg->nodes.first; low_node; low_node = low_node->next)
00295     {
00296         for (high_node = high_rg->nodes.first; high_node; high_node = high_node->next)
00297         {
00298             if (low_node->index == high_node->index)
00299             {
00300                 high_node->link_down = low_node;
00301                 low_node->link_up = high_node;
00302                 break;
00303             }
00304         }
00305     }
00306 }

00319 ReebNode *BIF_lowestLevelNode(ReebNode *node)
00320 {
00321     while (node->link_down)
00322     {
00323         node = node->link_down;
00324     }
00325     
00326     return node;

00330 static ReebArc * copyArc(ReebGraph *rg, ReebArc *arc)
00331 {
00332     ReebArc *cp_arc;
00333     ReebNode *node;
00334     
00335     cp_arc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ReebArc), "reeb arc copy");
00336 
00337     memcpy(cp_arc, arc, sizeof(ReebArc));
00338     
00339     cp_arc->link_up = arc;
00340     
00341     cp_arc->head = NULL;
00342     cp_arc->tail = NULL;
00343 
00344     cp_arc->prev = NULL;
00345     cp_arc->next = NULL;
00346 
00347     cp_arc->edges.first = NULL;
00348     cp_arc->edges.last = NULL;
00349 
00350     /* copy buckets */  
00351     cp_arc->buckets = MEM_callocN(sizeof(EmbedBucket) * cp_arc->bcount, "embed bucket");
00352     memcpy(cp_arc->buckets, arc->buckets, sizeof(EmbedBucket) * cp_arc->bcount);
00353     
00354     /* copy faces map */
00355     cp_arc->faces = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "copyArc gh");
00356     mergeArcFaces(rg, cp_arc, arc);
00357     
00358     /* find corresponding head and tail */
00359     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node && (cp_arc->head == NULL || cp_arc->tail == NULL); node = node->next)
00360     {
00361         if (node->index == arc->head->index)
00362         {
00363             cp_arc->head = node;
00364         }
00365         else if (node->index == arc->tail->index)
00366         {
00367             cp_arc->tail = node;
00368         }
00369     }
00370     
00371     BLI_addtail(&rg->arcs, cp_arc);
00372     
00373     return cp_arc;
00374 }

00376 static ReebGraph * copyReebGraph(ReebGraph *rg, int level)
00377 {
00378     ReebNode *node;
00379     ReebArc *arc;
00380     ReebGraph *cp_rg = newReebGraph();
00381     
00382     cp_rg->resolution = rg->resolution;
00383     cp_rg->length = rg->length;
00384     cp_rg->link_up = rg;
00385     cp_rg->multi_level = level;
00386 
00387     /* Copy nodes */    
00388     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
00389     {
00390         ReebNode *cp_node = copyNode(cp_rg, node);
00391         cp_node->multi_level = level;
00392     }
00393     
00394     /* Copy arcs */
00395     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00396     {
00397         copyArc(cp_rg, arc);
00398     }
00399     
00400     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)cp_rg);
00401     
00402     return cp_rg;
00403 }
00404 #endif

00406 ReebGraph *BIF_graphForMultiNode(ReebGraph *rg, ReebNode *node)
00407 {
00408     ReebGraph *multi_rg = rg;
00409     
00410     while (multi_rg && multi_rg->multi_level != node->multi_level)
00411     {
00412         multi_rg = multi_rg->link_up;
00413     }
00414     
00415     return multi_rg;
00416 }

00432 static void printArc(ReebArc *arc)
00433 {
00434     ReebEdge *edge;
00435     ReebNode *head = (ReebNode*)arc->head;
00436     ReebNode *tail = (ReebNode*)arc->tail;
00437     printf("arc: (%i) %f -> (%i) %f\n", head->index, head->weight, tail->index, tail->weight);
00438     
00439     for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge ; edge = edge->next)
00440     {
00441         printf("\tedge (%i, %i)\n", edge->v1->index, edge->v2->index);
00442     }
00443 }

00445 static void flipArc(ReebArc *arc)
00446 {
00447     ReebNode *tmp;
00448     tmp = arc->head;
00449     arc->head = arc->tail;
00450     arc->tail = tmp;
00451     
00452     flipArcBuckets(arc);
00453 }

00481 void repositionNodes(ReebGraph *rg)
00482 {
00483     BArc *arc = NULL;
00484     BNode *node = NULL;
00485     
00486     // Reset node positions
00487     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
00488     {
00489         node->p[0] = node->p[1] = node->p[2] = 0;
00490     }
00491     
00492     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00493     {
00494         if (((ReebArc*)arc)->bcount > 0)
00495         {
00496             float p[3];
00497             
00498             copy_v3_v3(p, ((ReebArc*)arc)->buckets[0].p);
00499             mul_v3_fl(p, 1.0f / arc->head->degree);
00500             add_v3_v3(arc->head->p, p);
00501             
00502             copy_v3_v3(p, ((ReebArc*)arc)->buckets[((ReebArc*)arc)->bcount - 1].p);
00503             mul_v3_fl(p, 1.0f / arc->tail->degree);
00504             add_v3_v3(arc->tail->p, p);
00505         }
00506     }
00507 }
00508 
00509 void verifyNodeDegree(ReebGraph *rg)
00510 {
00511 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
00512     ReebNode *node = NULL;
00513     ReebArc *arc = NULL;
00514 
00515     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
00516     {
00517         int count = 0;
00518         for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00519         {
00520             if (arc->head == node || arc->tail == node)
00521             {
00522                 count++;
00523             }
00524         }
00525         if (count != node->degree)
00526         {
00527             printf("degree error in node %i: expected %i got %i\n", node->index, count, node->degree);
00528         }
00529         if (node->degree == 0)
00530         {
00531             printf("zero degree node %i with weight %f\n", node->index, node->weight);
00532         }
00533     }
00534 #endif
00535 }
00536 
00537 static void verifyBucketsArc(ReebGraph *UNUSED(rg), ReebArc *arc)
00538 {
00539     ReebNode *head = (ReebNode*)arc->head;
00540     ReebNode *tail = (ReebNode*)arc->tail;
00541 
00542     if (arc->bcount > 0)
00543     {
00544         int i;
00545         for (i = 0; i < arc->bcount; i++)
00546         {
00547             if (arc->buckets[i].nv == 0)
00548             {
00549                 printArc(arc);
00550                 printf("count error in bucket %i/%i\n", i+1, arc->bcount);
00551             }
00552         }
00553         
00554         if (ceilf(head->weight) != arc->buckets[0].val)
00555         {
00556             printArc(arc);
00557             printf("alloc error in first bucket: %f should be %f\n", arc->buckets[0].val, ceil(head->weight));
00558         }
00559         if (floorf(tail->weight) != arc->buckets[arc->bcount - 1].val)
00560         {
00561             printArc(arc);
00562             printf("alloc error in last bucket: %f should be %f\n", arc->buckets[arc->bcount - 1].val, floor(tail->weight));
00563         }
00564     }
00565 }

00591 void verifyArcs(ReebGraph *rg)
00592 {
00593     ReebArc *arc;
00594     
00595     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00596     {
00597         if (arc->head->weight > arc->tail->weight)
00598         {
00599             printf("FLIPPED ARC!\n");
00600         }
00601     }
00602 }

00604 static void verifyMultiResolutionLinks(ReebGraph *rg, int level)
00605 {
00606 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
00607     ReebGraph *lower_rg = rg->link_up;
00608     
00609     if (lower_rg)
00610     {
00611         ReebArc *arc;
00612         
00613         for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00614         {
00615             if (BLI_findindex(&lower_rg->arcs, arc->link_up) == -1)
00616             {
00617                 printf("missing arc %p for level %i\n", (void *)arc->link_up, level);
00618                 printf("Source arc was ---\n");
00619                 printArc(arc);
00620 
00621                 arc->link_up = NULL;
00622             }
00623         }
00624         
00625         
00626         verifyMultiResolutionLinks(lower_rg, level + 1);
00627     }
00628 #endif
00629 }
00630 /***************************************** BUCKET UTILS **********************************************/

00632 static void addVertToBucket(EmbedBucket *b, float co[3])
00633 {
00634     b->nv++;
00635     interp_v3_v3v3(b->p, b->p, co, 1.0f / b->nv);
00636 }
00637 
00638 #if 0 /* UNUSED 2.5 */
00639 static void removeVertFromBucket(EmbedBucket *b, float co[3])
00640 {
00641     mul_v3_fl(b->p, (float)b->nv);
00642     sub_v3_v3(b->p, co);
00643     b->nv--;
00644     mul_v3_fl(b->p, 1.0f / (float)b->nv);
00645 }
00646 #endif
00647 
00648 static void mergeBuckets(EmbedBucket *bDst, EmbedBucket *bSrc)
00649 {
00650     if (bDst->nv > 0 && bSrc->nv > 0)
00651     {
00652         bDst->nv += bSrc->nv;
00653         interp_v3_v3v3(bDst->p, bDst->p, bSrc->p, (float)bSrc->nv / (float)(bDst->nv));
00654     }
00655     else if (bSrc->nv > 0)
00656     {
00657         bDst->nv = bSrc->nv;
00658         copy_v3_v3(bDst->p, bSrc->p);
00659     }
00660 }
00661 
00662 static void mergeArcBuckets(ReebArc *aDst, ReebArc *aSrc, float start, float end)
00663 {
00664     if (aDst->bcount > 0 && aSrc->bcount > 0)
00665     {
00666         int indexDst = 0, indexSrc = 0;
00667         
00668         start = MAX3(start, aDst->buckets[0].val, aSrc->buckets[0].val);
00669         
00670         while (indexDst < aDst->bcount && aDst->buckets[indexDst].val < start)
00671         {
00672             indexDst++;
00673         }
00674 
00675         while (indexSrc < aSrc->bcount && aSrc->buckets[indexSrc].val < start)
00676         {
00677             indexSrc++;
00678         }
00679         
00680         for ( ; indexDst < aDst->bcount &&
00681                 indexSrc < aSrc->bcount &&
00682                 aDst->buckets[indexDst].val <= end &&
00683                 aSrc->buckets[indexSrc].val <= end
00684                 
00685              ;  indexDst++, indexSrc++)
00686         {
00687             mergeBuckets(aDst->buckets + indexDst, aSrc->buckets + indexSrc);
00688         }
00689     }
00690 }
00691 
00692 void flipArcBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00693 {
00694     int i, j;
00695     
00696     for (i = 0, j = arc->bcount - 1; i < j; i++, j--)
00697     {
00698         EmbedBucket tmp;
00699         
00700         tmp = arc->buckets[i];
00701         arc->buckets[i] = arc->buckets[j];
00702         arc->buckets[j] = tmp;
00703     }
00704 }
00705 
00706 static int countArcBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00707 {
00708     return (int)(floor(arc->tail->weight) - ceil(arc->head->weight)) + 1;
00709 }
00710 
00711 static void allocArcBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00712 {
00713     int i;
00714     float start = ceil(arc->head->weight);
00715     arc->bcount = countArcBuckets(arc);
00716     
00717     if (arc->bcount > 0)
00718     {
00719         arc->buckets = MEM_callocN(sizeof(EmbedBucket) * arc->bcount, "embed bucket");
00720         
00721         for (i = 0; i < arc->bcount; i++)
00722         {
00723             arc->buckets[i].val = start + i;
00724         }
00725     }
00726     else
00727     {
00728         arc->buckets = NULL;
00729     }
00730     
00731 }
00732 
00733 static void resizeArcBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00734 {
00735     EmbedBucket *oldBuckets = arc->buckets;
00736     int oldBCount = arc->bcount;
00737     
00738     if (countArcBuckets(arc) == oldBCount)
00739     {
00740         return;
00741     }
00742     
00743     allocArcBuckets(arc);
00744     
00745     if (oldBCount != 0 && arc->bcount != 0)
00746     {
00747         int oldStart = (int)oldBuckets[0].val;
00748         int oldEnd = (int)oldBuckets[oldBCount - 1].val;
00749         int newStart = (int)arc->buckets[0].val;
00750         int newEnd = (int)arc->buckets[arc->bcount - 1].val;
00751         int oldOffset = 0;
00752         int newOffset = 0;
00753         int len;
00754         
00755         if (oldStart < newStart)
00756         {
00757             oldOffset = newStart - oldStart;
00758         }
00759         else
00760         {
00761             newOffset = oldStart - newStart;
00762         }
00763         
00764         len = MIN2(oldEnd - (oldStart + oldOffset) + 1, newEnd - (newStart - newOffset) + 1);
00765         
00766         memcpy(arc->buckets + newOffset, oldBuckets + oldOffset, len * sizeof(EmbedBucket)); 
00767     }
00768 
00769     if (oldBuckets != NULL)
00770     {
00771         MEM_freeN(oldBuckets);
00772     }
00773 }
00774 
00775 static void reweightBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00776 {
00777     int i;
00778     float start = ceil((arc->head)->weight);
00779     
00780     if (arc->bcount > 0)
00781     {
00782         for (i = 0; i < arc->bcount; i++)
00783         {
00784             arc->buckets[i].val = start + i;
00785         }
00786     }
00787 }
00788 
00789 static void interpolateBuckets(ReebArc *arc, float *start_p, float *end_p, int start_index, int end_index)
00790 {
00791     int total;
00792     int j;
00793     
00794     total = end_index - start_index + 2;
00795     
00796     for (j = start_index; j <= end_index; j++)
00797     {
00798         EmbedBucket *empty = arc->buckets + j;
00799         empty->nv = 1;
00800         interp_v3_v3v3(empty->p, start_p, end_p, (float)(j - start_index + 1) / total);
00801     }
00802 }
00803 
00804 static void fillArcEmptyBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00805 {
00806     float *start_p, *end_p;
00807     int start_index = 0, end_index = 0;
00808     int missing = 0;
00809     int i;
00810     
00811     start_p = arc->head->p;
00812     
00813     for (i = 0; i < arc->bcount; i++)
00814     {
00815         EmbedBucket *bucket = arc->buckets + i;
00816         
00817         if (missing)
00818         {
00819             if (bucket->nv > 0)
00820             {
00821                 missing = 0;
00822                 
00823                 end_p = bucket->p;
00824                 end_index = i - 1;
00825                 
00826                 interpolateBuckets(arc, start_p, end_p, start_index, end_index);
00827             }
00828         }
00829         else
00830         {
00831             if (bucket->nv == 0)
00832             {
00833                 missing = 1;
00834                 
00835                 if (i > 0)
00836                 {
00837                     start_p = arc->buckets[i - 1].p;
00838                 }
00839                 start_index = i;
00840             }
00841         }
00842     }
00843     
00844     if (missing)
00845     {
00846         end_p = arc->tail->p;
00847         end_index = arc->bcount - 1;
00848         
00849         interpolateBuckets(arc, start_p, end_p, start_index, end_index);
00850     }
00851 }
00852 
00853 static void ExtendArcBuckets(ReebArc *arc)
00854 {
00855     ReebArcIterator arc_iter;
00856     BArcIterator *iter = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter;
00857     EmbedBucket *last_bucket, *first_bucket;
00858     float *previous = NULL;
00859     float average_length = 0, length;
00860     int padding_head = 0, padding_tail = 0;
00861     
00862     if (arc->bcount == 0)
00863     {
00864         return; /* failsafe, shouldn't happen */
00865     }
00866     
00867     initArcIterator(iter, arc, arc->head);
00868     IT_next(iter);
00869     previous = iter->p;
00870     
00871     for (   IT_next(iter);
00872             IT_stopped(iter) == 0;
00873             previous = iter->p, IT_next(iter)
00874         )
00875     {
00876         average_length += len_v3v3(previous, iter->p);
00877     }
00878     average_length /= (arc->bcount - 1);
00879     
00880     first_bucket = arc->buckets;
00881     last_bucket = arc->buckets + (arc->bcount - 1);
00882     
00883     length = len_v3v3(first_bucket->p, arc->head->p);
00884     if (length > 2 * average_length)
00885     {
00886         padding_head = (int)floor(length / average_length);
00887     }
00888 
00889     length = len_v3v3(last_bucket->p, arc->tail->p);
00890     if (length > 2 * average_length)
00891     {
00892         padding_tail = (int)floor(length / average_length);
00893     }
00894     
00895     if (padding_head + padding_tail > 0)
00896     {
00897         EmbedBucket *old_buckets = arc->buckets;
00898         
00899         arc->buckets = MEM_callocN(sizeof(EmbedBucket) * (padding_head + arc->bcount + padding_tail), "embed bucket");
00900         memcpy(arc->buckets + padding_head, old_buckets, arc->bcount * sizeof(EmbedBucket));
00901         
00902         arc->bcount = padding_head + arc->bcount + padding_tail;
00903         
00904         MEM_freeN(old_buckets);
00905     }
00906     
00907     if (padding_head > 0)
00908     {
00909         interpolateBuckets(arc, arc->head->p, first_bucket->p, 0, padding_head);
00910     }
00911     
00912     if (padding_tail > 0)
00913     {
00914         interpolateBuckets(arc, last_bucket->p, arc->tail->p, arc->bcount - padding_tail, arc->bcount - 1);
00915     }
00916 }
00917 
00918 /* CALL THIS ONLY AFTER FILTERING, SINCE IT MESSES UP WEIGHT DISTRIBUTION */
00919 static void extendGraphBuckets(ReebGraph *rg)
00920 {
00921     ReebArc *arc;
00922     
00923     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00924     {
00925         ExtendArcBuckets(arc);
00926     }
00927 }
00928 
00929 /**************************************** LENGTH CALCULATIONS ****************************************/
00930 
00931 static void calculateArcLength(ReebArc *arc)
00932 {
00933     ReebArcIterator arc_iter;
00934     BArcIterator *iter = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter;
00935     float *vec0, *vec1;
00936 
00937     arc->length = 0;
00938     
00939     initArcIterator(iter, arc, arc->head);
00940 
00941     vec0 = arc->head->p;
00942     vec1 = arc->head->p; /* in case there's no embedding */
00943 
00944     while (IT_next(iter))   
00945     {
00946         vec1 = iter->p;
00947         
00948         arc->length += len_v3v3(vec0, vec1);
00949         
00950         vec0 = vec1;
00951     }
00952     
00953     arc->length += len_v3v3(arc->tail->p, vec1);    
00954 }
00955 
00956 static void calculateGraphLength(ReebGraph *rg)
00957 {
00958     ReebArc *arc;
00959     
00960     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
00961     {
00962         calculateArcLength(arc);
00963     }
00964 }
00965 #endif
00966 
00967 /**************************************** SYMMETRY HANDLING ******************************************/
00968 
00969 void REEB_RadialSymmetry(BNode* root_node, RadialArc* ring, int count)
00970 {
00971     ReebNode *node = (ReebNode*)root_node;
00972     float axis[3];
00973     int i;
00974     
00975     copy_v3_v3(axis, root_node->symmetry_axis);
00976     
00977     /* first pass, merge incrementally */
00978     for (i = 0; i < count - 1; i++)
00979     {
00980         ReebNode *node1, *node2;
00981         ReebArc *arc1, *arc2;
00982         float tangent[3];
00983         float normal[3];
00984         int j = i + 1;
00985 
00986         add_v3_v3v3(tangent, ring[i].n, ring[j].n);
00987         cross_v3_v3v3(normal, tangent, axis);
00988         
00989         node1 = (ReebNode*)BLI_otherNode(ring[i].arc, root_node);
00990         node2 = (ReebNode*)BLI_otherNode(ring[j].arc, root_node);
00991         
00992         arc1 = (ReebArc*)ring[i].arc;
00993         arc2 = (ReebArc*)ring[j].arc;
00994 
00995         /* mirror first node and mix with the second */
00996         BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(node1->p, root_node->p, normal);
00997         interp_v3_v3v3(node2->p, node2->p, node1->p, 1.0f / (j + 1));
00998         
00999         /* Merge buckets
01000          * there shouldn't be any null arcs here, but just to be safe 
01001          * */
01002         if (arc1->bcount > 0 && arc2->bcount > 0)
01003         {
01004             ReebArcIterator arc_iter1, arc_iter2;
01005             BArcIterator *iter1 = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter1;
01006             BArcIterator *iter2 = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter2;
01007             EmbedBucket *bucket1 = NULL, *bucket2 = NULL;
01008             
01009             initArcIterator(iter1, arc1, (ReebNode*)root_node);
01010             initArcIterator(iter2, arc2, (ReebNode*)root_node);
01011             
01012             bucket1 = IT_next(iter1);
01013             bucket2 = IT_next(iter2);
01014         
01015             /* Make sure they both start at the same value */   
01016             while (bucket1 && bucket2 && bucket1->val < bucket2->val)
01017             {
01018                 bucket1 = IT_next(iter1);
01019             }
01020             
01021             while (bucket1 && bucket2 && bucket2->val < bucket1->val)
01022             {
01023                 bucket2 = IT_next(iter2);
01024             }
01025     
01026     
01027             for ( ;bucket1 && bucket2; bucket1 = IT_next(iter1), bucket2 = IT_next(iter2))
01028             {
01029                 bucket2->nv += bucket1->nv; /* add counts */
01030                 
01031                 /* mirror on axis */
01032                 BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(bucket1->p, root_node->p, normal);
01033                 /* add bucket2 in bucket1 */
01034                 interp_v3_v3v3(bucket2->p, bucket2->p, bucket1->p, (float)bucket1->nv / (float)(bucket2->nv));
01035             }
01036         }
01037     }
01038     
01039     /* second pass, mirror back on previous arcs */
01040     for (i = count - 1; i > 0; i--)
01041     {
01042         ReebNode *node1, *node2;
01043         ReebArc *arc1, *arc2;
01044         float tangent[3];
01045         float normal[3];
01046         int j = i - 1;
01047 
01048         add_v3_v3v3(tangent, ring[i].n, ring[j].n);
01049         cross_v3_v3v3(normal, tangent, axis);
01050         
01051         node1 = (ReebNode*)BLI_otherNode(ring[i].arc, root_node);
01052         node2 = (ReebNode*)BLI_otherNode(ring[j].arc, root_node);
01053         
01054         arc1 = (ReebArc*)ring[i].arc;
01055         arc2 = (ReebArc*)ring[j].arc;
01056 
01057         /* copy first node than mirror */
01058         copy_v3_v3(node2->p, node1->p);
01059         BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(node2->p, root_node->p, normal);
01060         
01061         /* Copy buckets
01062          * there shouldn't be any null arcs here, but just to be safe 
01063          * */
01064         if (arc1->bcount > 0 && arc2->bcount > 0)
01065         {
01066             ReebArcIterator arc_iter1, arc_iter2;
01067             BArcIterator *iter1 = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter1;
01068             BArcIterator *iter2 = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter2;
01069             EmbedBucket *bucket1 = NULL, *bucket2 = NULL;
01070             
01071             initArcIterator(iter1, arc1, node);
01072             initArcIterator(iter2, arc2, node);
01073             
01074             bucket1 = IT_next(iter1);
01075             bucket2 = IT_next(iter2);
01076         
01077             /* Make sure they both start at the same value */   
01078             while (bucket1 && bucket1->val < bucket2->val)
01079             {
01080                 bucket1 = IT_next(iter1);
01081             }
01082             
01083             while (bucket2 && bucket2->val < bucket1->val)
01084             {
01085                 bucket2 = IT_next(iter2);
01086             }
01087     
01088     
01089             for ( ;bucket1 && bucket2; bucket1 = IT_next(iter1), bucket2 = IT_next(iter2))
01090             {
01091                 /* copy and mirror back to bucket2 */           
01092                 bucket2->nv = bucket1->nv;
01093                 copy_v3_v3(bucket2->p, bucket1->p);
01094                 BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(bucket2->p, node->p, normal);
01095             }
01096         }
01097     }
01098 }
01099 
01100 void REEB_AxialSymmetry(BNode* root_node, BNode* node1, BNode* node2, struct BArc* barc1, BArc* barc2)
01101 {
01102     ReebArc *arc1, *arc2;
01103     float nor[3], p[3];
01104 
01105     arc1 = (ReebArc*)barc1;
01106     arc2 = (ReebArc*)barc2;
01107 
01108     copy_v3_v3(nor, root_node->symmetry_axis);
01109     
01110     /* mirror node2 along axis */
01111     copy_v3_v3(p, node2->p);
01112     BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(p, root_node->p, nor);
01113 
01114     /* average with node1 */
01115     add_v3_v3(node1->p, p);
01116     mul_v3_fl(node1->p, 0.5f);
01117     
01118     /* mirror back on node2 */
01119     copy_v3_v3(node2->p, node1->p);
01120     BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(node2->p, root_node->p, nor);
01121     
01122     /* Merge buckets
01123      * there shouldn't be any null arcs here, but just to be safe 
01124      * */
01125     if (arc1->bcount > 0 && arc2->bcount > 0)
01126     {
01127         ReebArcIterator arc_iter1, arc_iter2;
01128         BArcIterator *iter1 = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter1;
01129         BArcIterator *iter2 = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter2;
01130         EmbedBucket *bucket1 = NULL, *bucket2 = NULL;
01131         
01132         initArcIterator(iter1, arc1, (ReebNode*)root_node);
01133         initArcIterator(iter2, arc2, (ReebNode*)root_node);
01134         
01135         bucket1 = IT_next(iter1);
01136         bucket2 = IT_next(iter2);
01137     
01138         /* Make sure they both start at the same value */   
01139         while (bucket1 && bucket1->val < bucket2->val)
01140         {
01141             bucket1 = IT_next(iter1);
01142         }
01143         
01144         while (bucket2 && bucket2->val < bucket1->val)
01145         {
01146             bucket2 = IT_next(iter2);
01147         }
01148 
01149 
01150         for ( ;bucket1 && bucket2; bucket1 = IT_next(iter1), bucket2 = IT_next(iter2))
01151         {
01152             bucket1->nv += bucket2->nv; /* add counts */
01153             
01154             /* mirror on axis */
01155             BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(bucket2->p, root_node->p, nor);
01156             /* add bucket2 in bucket1 */
01157             interp_v3_v3v3(bucket1->p, bucket1->p, bucket2->p, (float)bucket2->nv / (float)(bucket1->nv));
01158 
01159             /* copy and mirror back to bucket2 */           
01160             bucket2->nv = bucket1->nv;
01161             copy_v3_v3(bucket2->p, bucket1->p);
01162             BLI_mirrorAlongAxis(bucket2->p, root_node->p, nor);
01163         }
01164     }
01165 }
