01167 /************************************** ADJACENCY LIST *************************************************/
01168 
01169 
01170 /****************************************** SMOOTHING **************************************************/
01171 
01172 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
01173 void postprocessGraph(ReebGraph *rg, char mode)
01174 {
01175     ReebArc *arc;
01176     float fac1 = 0, fac2 = 1, fac3 = 0;
01177 
01178     switch(mode)
01179     {
01180     case SKGEN_AVERAGE:
01181         fac1 = fac2 = fac3 = 1.0f / 3.0f;
01182         break;
01183     case SKGEN_SMOOTH:
01184         fac1 = fac3 = 0.25f;
01185         fac2 = 0.5f;
01186         break;
01187     case SKGEN_SHARPEN:
01188         fac1 = fac3 = -0.25f;
01189         fac2 = 1.5f;
01190         break;
01191     default:
01192 //      XXX
01193 //      error("Unknown post processing mode");
01194         return;
01195     }
01196     
01197     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
01198     {
01199         EmbedBucket *buckets = arc->buckets;
01200         int bcount = arc->bcount;
01201         int index;
01202 
01203         for (index = 1; index < bcount - 1; index++)
01204         {
01205             interp_v3_v3v3(buckets[index].p, buckets[index].p, buckets[index - 1].p, fac1 / (fac1 + fac2));
01206             interp_v3_v3v3(buckets[index].p, buckets[index].p, buckets[index + 1].p, fac3 / (fac1 + fac2 + fac3));
01207         }
01208     }
01209 }
01210 
01211 /********************************************SORTING****************************************************/
01212 
01213 static int compareNodesWeight(void *vnode1, void *vnode2)
01214 {
01215     ReebNode *node1 = (ReebNode*)vnode1;
01216     ReebNode *node2 = (ReebNode*)vnode2;
01217     
01218     if (node1->weight < node2->weight)
01219     {
01220         return -1;
01221     }
01222     if (node1->weight > node2->weight)
01223     {
01224         return 1;
01225     }
01226     else
01227     {
01228         return 0;
01229     }
01230 }
01231 
01232 void sortNodes(ReebGraph *rg)
01233 {
01234     BLI_sortlist(&rg->nodes, compareNodesWeight);
01235 }
01236 
01237 static int compareArcsWeight(void *varc1, void *varc2)
01238 {
01239     ReebArc *arc1 = (ReebArc*)varc1;
01240     ReebArc *arc2 = (ReebArc*)varc2;
01241     ReebNode *node1 = (ReebNode*)arc1->head; 
01242     ReebNode *node2 = (ReebNode*)arc2->head; 
01243     
01244     if (node1->weight < node2->weight)
01245     {
01246         return -1;
01247     }
01248     if (node1->weight > node2->weight)
01249     {
01250         return 1;
01251     }
01252     else
01253     {
01254         return 0;
01255     }
01256 }
01257 
01258 void sortArcs(ReebGraph *rg)
01259 {
01260     BLI_sortlist(&rg->arcs, compareArcsWeight);
01261 }
01262 /******************************************* JOINING ***************************************************/
01263 
01264 static void reweightArc(ReebGraph *rg, ReebArc *arc, ReebNode *start_node, float start_weight)
01265 {
01266     ReebNode *node;
01267     float old_weight;
01268     float end_weight = start_weight + ABS(arc->tail->weight - arc->head->weight);
01269     int i;
01270     
01271     node = (ReebNode*)BLI_otherNode((BArc*)arc, (BNode*)start_node);
01272     
01273     /* prevent backtracking */
01274     if (node->flag == 1)
01275     {
01276         return;
01277     }
01278 
01279     if (arc->tail == start_node)
01280     {
01281         flipArc(arc);
01282     }
01283     
01284     start_node->flag = 1;
01285     
01286     for (i = 0; i < node->degree; i++)
01287     {
01288         ReebArc *next_arc = node->arcs[i];
01289         
01290         reweightArc(rg, next_arc, node, end_weight);
01291     }
01292 
01293     /* update only if needed */ 
01294     if (arc->head->weight != start_weight || arc->tail->weight != end_weight)
01295     {
01296         old_weight = arc->head->weight; /* backup head weight, other arcs need it intact, it will be fixed by the source arc */
01297         
01298         arc->head->weight = start_weight;
01299         arc->tail->weight = end_weight;
01300         
01301         reweightBuckets(arc);
01302         resizeArcBuckets(arc);
01303         fillArcEmptyBuckets(arc);
01304         
01305         arc->head->weight = old_weight;
01306     }
01307 } 
01308 
01309 static void reweightSubgraph(ReebGraph *rg, ReebNode *start_node, float start_weight)
01310 {
01311     int i;
01312         
01313     BLI_flagNodes((BGraph*)rg, 0);
01314 
01315     for (i = 0; i < start_node->degree; i++)
01316     {
01317         ReebArc *next_arc = start_node->arcs[i];
01318         
01319         reweightArc(rg, next_arc, start_node, start_weight);
01320     }
01321     start_node->weight = start_weight;
01322 }
01323 
01324 static int joinSubgraphsEnds(ReebGraph *rg, float threshold, int nb_subgraphs)
01325 {
01326     int joined = 0;
01327     int subgraph;
01328     
01329     for (subgraph = 1; subgraph <= nb_subgraphs; subgraph++)
01330     {
01331         ReebNode *start_node, *end_node;
01332         ReebNode *min_node_start = NULL, *min_node_end = NULL;
01333         float min_distance = FLT_MAX;
01334         
01335         for (start_node = rg->nodes.first; start_node; start_node = start_node->next)
01336         {
01337             if (start_node->subgraph_index == subgraph && start_node->degree == 1)
01338             {
01339                 
01340                 for (end_node = rg->nodes.first; end_node; end_node = end_node->next)
01341                 {
01342                     if (end_node->subgraph_index != subgraph)
01343                     {
01344                         float distance = len_v3v3(start_node->p, end_node->p);
01345                         
01346                         if (distance < threshold && distance < min_distance)
01347                         {
01348                             min_distance = distance;
01349                             min_node_end = end_node;
01350                             min_node_start = start_node;
01351                         }
01352                     }
01353                 }
01354             }
01355         }
01356         
01357         end_node = min_node_end;
01358         start_node = min_node_start;
01359         
01360         if (end_node && start_node)
01361         {
01362             ReebArc *start_arc /* , *end_arc */ /* UNUSED */;
01363             int merging = 0;
01364             
01365             start_arc = start_node->arcs[0];
01366             /* end_arc = end_node->arcs[0]; */ /* UNUSED */
01367             
01368             if (start_arc->tail == start_node)
01369             {
01370                 reweightSubgraph(rg, end_node, start_node->weight);
01371                 
01372                 start_arc->tail = end_node;
01373                 
01374                 merging = 1;
01375             }
01376             else if (start_arc->head == start_node)
01377             {
01378                 reweightSubgraph(rg, start_node, end_node->weight);
01379 
01380                 start_arc->head = end_node;
01381 
01382                 merging = 2;
01383             }
01384             
01385             if (merging)
01386             {
01387                 BLI_ReflagSubgraph((BGraph*)rg, end_node->flag, subgraph);
01388                                     
01389                 resizeArcBuckets(start_arc);
01390                 fillArcEmptyBuckets(start_arc);
01391                 
01392                 NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, end_node);
01393                 BLI_rebuildAdjacencyListForNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)end_node);
01394                 
01395                 BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)start_node);
01396             }
01397             
01398             joined = 1;
01399         }       
01400     }
01401     
01402     return joined;
01403 }
01404 
01405 /* Reweight graph from smallest node, fix fliped arcs */
01406 static void fixSubgraphsOrientation(ReebGraph *rg, int nb_subgraphs)
01407 {
01408     int subgraph;
01409     
01410     for (subgraph = 1; subgraph <= nb_subgraphs; subgraph++)
01411     {
01412         ReebNode *node;
01413         ReebNode *start_node = NULL;
01414         
01415         for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = node->next)
01416         {
01417             if (node->subgraph_index == subgraph)
01418             {
01419                 if (start_node == NULL || node->weight < start_node->weight)
01420                 {
01421                     start_node = node;
01422                 }
01423             }
01424         }
01425         
01426         if (start_node)
01427         {
01428             reweightSubgraph(rg, start_node, start_node->weight);
01429         }
01430     }
01431 }
01432 
01433 static int joinSubgraphs(ReebGraph *rg, float threshold)
01434 {
01435     int nb_subgraphs;
01436     int joined = 0;
01437     
01438     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
01439     
01440     if (BLI_isGraphCyclic((BGraph*)rg))
01441     {
01442         /* don't deal with cyclic graphs YET */
01443         return 0;
01444     }
01445     
01446     /* sort nodes before flagging subgraphs to make sure root node is subgraph 0 */
01447     sortNodes(rg);
01448     
01449     nb_subgraphs = BLI_FlagSubgraphs((BGraph*)rg);
01450     
01451     /* Harmonic function can create flipped arcs, take the occasion to fix them */
01452 //  XXX
01453 //  if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_HARMONIC)
01454 //  {
01455         fixSubgraphsOrientation(rg, nb_subgraphs);
01456 //  }
01457 
01458     if (nb_subgraphs > 1)
01459     {
01460         joined |= joinSubgraphsEnds(rg, threshold, nb_subgraphs);
01461         
01462         if (joined)
01463         {
01464             removeNormalNodes(rg);
01465             BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
01466         }
01467     }
01468     
01469     return joined;
01470 }
01471 
01472 /****************************************** FILTERING **************************************************/
01473 
01474 static float lengthArc(ReebArc *arc)
01475 {
01476 #if 0
01477     ReebNode *head = (ReebNode*)arc->head;
01478     ReebNode *tail = (ReebNode*)arc->tail;
01479     
01480     return tail->weight - head->weight;
01481 #else
01482     return arc->length;
01483 #endif
01484 }
01485 
01486 static int compareArcs(void *varc1, void *varc2)
01487 {
01488     ReebArc *arc1 = (ReebArc*)varc1;
01489     ReebArc *arc2 = (ReebArc*)varc2;
01490     float len1 = lengthArc(arc1);
01491     float len2 = lengthArc(arc2);
01492     
01493     if (len1 < len2)
01494     {
01495         return -1;
01496     }
01497     if (len1 > len2)
01498     {
01499         return 1;
01500     }
01501     else
01502     {
01503         return 0;
01504     }
01505 }
01506 
01507 static void filterArc(ReebGraph *rg, ReebNode *newNode, ReebNode *removedNode, ReebArc * srcArc, int merging)
01508 {
01509     ReebArc *arc = NULL, *nextArc = NULL;
01510 
01511     if (merging)
01512     {
01513         /* first pass, merge buckets for arcs that spawned the two nodes into the source arc*/
01514         for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
01515         {
01516             if (arc->head == srcArc->head && arc->tail == srcArc->tail && arc != srcArc)
01517             {
01518                 ReebNode *head = srcArc->head;
01519                 ReebNode *tail = srcArc->tail;
01520                 mergeArcBuckets(srcArc, arc, head->weight, tail->weight);
01521             }
01522         }
01523     }
01524 
01525     /* second pass, replace removedNode by newNode, remove arcs that are collapsed in a loop */
01526     arc = rg->arcs.first;
01527     while (arc)
01528     {
01529         nextArc = arc->next;
01530         
01531         if (arc->head == removedNode || arc->tail == removedNode)
01532         {
01533             if (arc->head == removedNode)
01534             {
01535                 arc->head = newNode;
01536             }
01537             else
01538             {
01539                 arc->tail = newNode;
01540             }
01541 
01542             // Remove looped arcs           
01543             if (arc->head == arc->tail)
01544             {
01545                 // v1 or v2 was already newNode, since we're removing an arc, decrement degree
01546                 NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, newNode);
01547                 
01548                 // If it's srcArc, it'll be removed later, so keep it for now
01549                 if (arc != srcArc)
01550                 {
01551                     BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, arc);
01552                     REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc);
01553                 }
01554             }
01555             else
01556             {
01557                 /* flip arcs that flipped, can happen on diamond shapes, mostly on null arcs */
01558                 if (arc->head->weight > arc->tail->weight)
01559                 {
01560                     flipArc(arc);
01561                 }
01562                 //newNode->degree++; // incrementing degree since we're adding an arc
01563                 NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, newNode);
01564                 mergeArcFaces(rg, arc, srcArc);
01565 
01566                 if (merging)
01567                 {
01568                     ReebNode *head = arc->head;
01569                     ReebNode *tail = arc->tail;
01570 
01571                     // resize bucket list
01572                     resizeArcBuckets(arc);
01573                     mergeArcBuckets(arc, srcArc, head->weight, tail->weight);
01574                     
01575                     /* update length */
01576                     arc->length += srcArc->length;
01577                 }
01578             }
01579         }
01580         
01581         arc = nextArc;
01582     }
01583 }
01584 
01585 void filterNullReebGraph(ReebGraph *rg)
01586 {
01587     ReebArc *arc = NULL, *nextArc = NULL;
01588     
01589     arc = rg->arcs.first;
01590     while (arc)
01591     {
01592         nextArc = arc->next;
01593         // Only collapse arcs too short to have any embed bucket
01594         if (arc->bcount == 0)
01595         {
01596             ReebNode *newNode = (ReebNode*)arc->head;
01597             ReebNode *removedNode = (ReebNode*)arc->tail;
01598             float blend;
01599             
01600             blend = (float)newNode->degree / (float)(newNode->degree + removedNode->degree); // blending factors
01601             
01602             interp_v3_v3v3(newNode->p, removedNode->p, newNode->p, blend);
01603             
01604             filterArc(rg, newNode, removedNode, arc, 0);
01605 
01606             // Reset nextArc, it might have changed
01607             nextArc = arc->next;
01608             
01609             BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, arc);
01610             REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc);
01611             
01612             BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)removedNode);
01613         }
01614         
01615         arc = nextArc;
01616     }
01617 }
01618 
01619 static int filterInternalExternalReebGraph(ReebGraph *rg, float threshold_internal, float threshold_external)
01620 {
01621     ReebArc *arc = NULL, *nextArc = NULL;
01622     int value = 0;
01623     
01624     BLI_sortlist(&rg->arcs, compareArcs);
01625     
01626     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = nextArc)
01627     {
01628         nextArc = arc->next;
01629 
01630         // Only collapse non-terminal arcs that are shorter than threshold
01631         if (threshold_internal > 0 && arc->head->degree > 1 && arc->tail->degree > 1 && (lengthArc(arc) < threshold_internal))
01632         {
01633             ReebNode *newNode = NULL;
01634             ReebNode *removedNode = NULL;
01635             
01636             /* Always remove lower node, so arcs don't flip */
01637             newNode = arc->head;
01638             removedNode = arc->tail;
01639 
01640             filterArc(rg, newNode, removedNode, arc, 1);
01641 
01642             // Reset nextArc, it might have changed
01643             nextArc = arc->next;
01644             
01645             BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, arc);
01646             REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc);
01647             
01648             BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)removedNode);
01649             value = 1;
01650         }
01651         
01652         // Only collapse terminal arcs that are shorter than threshold
01653         else if (threshold_external > 0 && (arc->head->degree == 1 || arc->tail->degree == 1) && (lengthArc(arc) < threshold_external))
01654         {
01655             ReebNode *terminalNode = NULL;
01656             ReebNode *middleNode = NULL;
01657             ReebNode *removedNode = NULL;
01658             
01659             // Assign terminal and middle nodes
01660             if (arc->head->degree == 1)
01661             {
01662                 terminalNode = arc->head;
01663                 middleNode = arc->tail;
01664             }
01665             else
01666             {
01667                 terminalNode = arc->tail;
01668                 middleNode = arc->head;
01669             }
01670             
01671             if (middleNode->degree == 2 && middleNode != rg->nodes.first)
01672             {
01673 #if 1
01674                 // If middle node is a normal node, it will be removed later
01675                 // Only if middle node is not the root node
01676                 /* USE THIS IF YOU WANT TO PROLONG ARCS TO THEIR TERMINAL NODES
01677                  * FOR HANDS, THIS IS NOT THE BEST RESULT 
01678                  * */
01679                 continue;
01680 #else
01681                 removedNode = terminalNode;
01682 
01683                 // removing arc, so we need to decrease the degree of the remaining node
01684                 NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, middleNode);
01685 #endif
01686             }
01687             // Otherwise, just plain remove of the arc
01688             else
01689             {
01690                 removedNode = terminalNode;
01691 
01692                 // removing arc, so we need to decrease the degree of the remaining node
01693                 NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, middleNode);
01694             }
01695 
01696             // Reset nextArc, it might have changed
01697             nextArc = arc->next;
01698             
01699             BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, arc);
01700             REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc);
01701             
01702             BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)removedNode);
01703             value = 1;
01704         }
01705     }
01706     
01707     return value;
01708 }
01709 
01710 static int filterCyclesReebGraph(ReebGraph *rg, float UNUSED(distance_threshold))
01711 {
01712     ReebArc *arc1, *arc2;
01713     ReebArc *next2;
01714     int filtered = 0;
01715     
01716     for (arc1 = rg->arcs.first; arc1; arc1 = arc1->next)
01717     {
01718         for (arc2 = arc1->next; arc2; arc2 = next2)
01719         {
01720             next2 = arc2->next;
01721             if (arc1 != arc2 && arc1->head == arc2->head && arc1->tail == arc2->tail)
01722             {
01723                 mergeArcEdges(rg, arc1, arc2, MERGE_APPEND);
01724                 mergeArcFaces(rg, arc1, arc2);
01725                 mergeArcBuckets(arc1, arc2, arc1->head->weight, arc1->tail->weight);
01726 
01727                 NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, arc1->head);
01728                 NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, arc1->tail);
01729 
01730                 BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, arc2);
01731                 REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc2);
01732                 
01733                 filtered = 1;
01734             }
01735         }
01736     }
01737     
01738     return filtered;
01739 }
01740 
01741 int filterSmartReebGraph(ReebGraph *UNUSED(rg), float UNUSED(threshold))
01742 {
01743     int value = 0;
01744 #if 0 //XXX
01745     ReebArc *arc = NULL, *nextArc = NULL;
01746     
01747     BLI_sortlist(&rg->arcs, compareArcs);
01748 
01749 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
01750     {   
01751         EditFace *efa;
01752         for (efa=G.editMesh->faces.first; efa; efa=efa->next) {
01753             efa->tmp.fp = -1;
01754         }
01755     }
01756 #endif
01757 
01758     arc = rg->arcs.first;
01759     while (arc)
01760     {
01761         nextArc = arc->next;
01762         
01763         /* need correct normals and center */
01764         recalc_editnormals();
01765 
01766         // Only test terminal arcs
01767         if (arc->head->degree == 1 || arc->tail->degree == 1)
01768         {
01769             GHashIterator ghi;
01770             int merging = 0;
01771             int total = BLI_ghash_size(arc->faces);
01772             float avg_angle = 0;
01773             float avg_vec[3] = {0,0,0};
01774             
01775             for (BLI_ghashIterator_init(&ghi, arc->faces);
01776                 !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(&ghi);
01777                 BLI_ghashIterator_step(&ghi))
01778             {
01779                 EditFace *efa = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(&ghi);
01780 
01781 #if 0
01782                 ReebArcIterator arc_iter;
01783                 BArcIterator *iter = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter;
01784                 EmbedBucket *bucket = NULL;
01785                 EmbedBucket *previous = NULL;
01786                 float min_distance = -1;
01787                 float angle = 0;
01788         
01789                 initArcIterator(iter, arc, arc->head);
01790         
01791                 bucket = nextBucket(iter);
01792                 
01793                 while (bucket != NULL)
01794                 {
01795                     float *vec0 = NULL;
01796                     float *vec1 = bucket->p;
01797                     float midpoint[3], tangent[3];
01798                     float distance;
01799         
01800                     /* first bucket. Previous is head */
01801                     if (previous == NULL)
01802                     {
01803                         vec0 = arc->head->p;
01804                     }
01805                     /* Previous is a valid bucket */
01806                     else
01807                     {
01808                         vec0 = previous->p;
01809                     }
01810                     
01811                     copy_v3_v3(midpoint, vec1);
01812                     
01813                     distance = len_v3v3(midpoint, efa->cent);
01814                     
01815                     if (min_distance == -1 || distance < min_distance)
01816                     {
01817                         min_distance = distance;
01818                     
01819                         sub_v3_v3v3(tangent, vec1, vec0);
01820                         normalize_v3(tangent);
01821                         
01822                         angle = dot_v3v3(tangent, efa->n);
01823                     }
01824                     
01825                     previous = bucket;
01826                     bucket = nextBucket(iter);
01827                 }
01828                 
01829                 avg_angle += saacos(fabs(angle));
01830 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
01831                 efa->tmp.fp = saacos(fabs(angle));
01832 #endif
01833 #else
01834                 add_v3_v3(avg_vec, efa->n);     
01835 #endif
01836             }
01837 
01838 
01839 #if 0           
01840             avg_angle /= total;
01841 #else
01842             mul_v3_fl(avg_vec, 1.0 / total);
01843             avg_angle = dot_v3v3(avg_vec, avg_vec);
01844 #endif
01845             
01846             arc->angle = avg_angle;
01847             
01848             if (avg_angle > threshold)
01849                 merging = 1;
01850             
01851             if (merging)
01852             {
01853                 ReebNode *terminalNode = NULL;
01854                 ReebNode *middleNode = NULL;
01855                 ReebNode *newNode = NULL;
01856                 ReebNode *removedNode = NULL;
01857                 int merging = 0;
01858                 
01859                 // Assign terminal and middle nodes
01860                 if (arc->head->degree == 1)
01861                 {
01862                     terminalNode = arc->head;
01863                     middleNode = arc->tail;
01864                 }
01865                 else
01866                 {
01867                     terminalNode = arc->tail;
01868                     middleNode = arc->head;
01869                 }
01870                 
01871                 // If middle node is a normal node, merge to terminal node
01872                 if (middleNode->degree == 2)
01873                 {
01874                     merging = 1;
01875                     newNode = terminalNode;
01876                     removedNode = middleNode;
01877                 }
01878                 // Otherwise, just plain remove of the arc
01879                 else
01880                 {
01881                     merging = 0;
01882                     newNode = middleNode;
01883                     removedNode = terminalNode;
01884                 }
01885                 
01886                 // Merging arc
01887                 if (merging)
01888                 {
01889                     filterArc(rg, newNode, removedNode, arc, 1);
01890                 }
01891                 else
01892                 {
01893                     // removing arc, so we need to decrease the degree of the remaining node
01894                     //newNode->degree--;
01895                     NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, newNode);
01896                 }
01897     
01898                 // Reset nextArc, it might have changed
01899                 nextArc = arc->next;
01900                 
01901                 BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, arc);
01902                 REEB_freeArc((BArc*)arc);
01903                 
01904                 BLI_freelinkN(&rg->nodes, removedNode);
01905                 value = 1;
01906             }
01907         }
01908         
01909         arc = nextArc;
01910     }
01911     
01912     #endif
01913     
01914     return value;
01915 }
01916 
01917 static void filterGraph(ReebGraph *rg, short options, float threshold_internal, float threshold_external)
01918 {
01919     int done = 1;
01920     
01921     calculateGraphLength(rg);
01922 
01923     if ((options & SKGEN_FILTER_EXTERNAL) == 0)
01924     {
01925         threshold_external = 0;
01926     }
01927 
01928     if ((options & SKGEN_FILTER_INTERNAL) == 0)
01929     {
01930         threshold_internal = 0;
01931     }
01932 
01933     if (threshold_internal > 0 || threshold_external > 0)
01934     { 
01935         /* filter until there's nothing more to do */
01936         while (done == 1)
01937         {
01938             done = 0; /* no work done yet */
01939             
01940             done = filterInternalExternalReebGraph(rg, threshold_internal, threshold_external);
01941         }
01942     }
01943 
01944     if (options & SKGEN_FILTER_SMART)
01945     {
01946         filterSmartReebGraph(rg, 0.5);
01947         filterCyclesReebGraph(rg, 0.5);
01948     }
01949 
01950     repositionNodes(rg);
01951 
01952     /* Filtering might have created degree 2 nodes, so remove them */
01953     removeNormalNodes(rg);
01954 }
01955 
01956 static void finalizeGraph(ReebGraph *rg, char passes, char method)
01957 {
01958     int i;
01959     
01960     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
01961 
01962     sortNodes(rg);
01963     
01964     sortArcs(rg);
01965     
01966     for (i = 0; i <  passes; i++)
01967     {
01968         postprocessGraph(rg, method);
01969     }
01970     
01971     extendGraphBuckets(rg);
01972 }
01973 
01974 /************************************** WEIGHT SPREADING ***********************************************/
01975 
01976 static int compareVerts( const void* a, const void* b )
01977 {
01978     EditVert *va = *(EditVert**)a;
01979     EditVert *vb = *(EditVert**)b;
01980     int value = 0;
01981     
01982     if (weightData(va) < weightData(vb))
01983     {
01984         value = -1;
01985     }
01986     else if (weightData(va) > weightData(vb))
01987     {
01988         value = 1;
01989     }
01990 
01991     return value;       
01992 }
01993 
01994 static void spreadWeight(EditMesh *em)
01995 {
01996     EditVert **verts, *eve;
01997     float lastWeight = 0.0f;
01998     int totvert = BLI_countlist(&em->verts);
01999     int i;
02000     int work_needed = 1;
02001     
02002     verts = MEM_callocN(sizeof(EditVert*) * totvert, "verts array");
02003     
02004     for (eve = em->verts.first, i = 0; eve; eve = eve->next, i++)
02005     {
02006         verts[i] = eve;
02007     }
02008     
02009     while (work_needed == 1)
02010     {
02011         work_needed = 0;
02012         qsort(verts, totvert, sizeof(EditVert*), compareVerts);
02013         
02014         for (i = 0; i < totvert; i++)
02015         {
02016             eve = verts[i];
02017             
02018             if (i == 0 || (weightData(eve) - lastWeight) > FLT_EPSILON)
02019             {
02020                 lastWeight = weightData(eve);
02021             }
02022             else
02023             {
02024                 work_needed = 1;
02025                 weightSetData(eve, lastWeight + FLT_EPSILON * 2);
02026                 lastWeight = weightData(eve);
02027             }
02028         }
02029     }
02030     
02031     MEM_freeN(verts);
02032 }
02033 
02034 /******************************************** EXPORT ***************************************************/
02035 
02036 static void exportNode(FILE *f, const char *text, ReebNode *node)
02037 {
02038     fprintf(f, "%s i:%i w:%f d:%i %f %f %f\n", text, node->index, node->weight, node->degree, node->p[0], node->p[1], node->p[2]);
02039 }
02040 
02041 void REEB_exportGraph(ReebGraph *rg, int count)
02042 {
02043     ReebArc *arc;
02044     char filename[128];
02045     FILE *f;
02046     
02047     if (count == -1)
02048     {
02049         strcpy(filename, "test.txt");
02050     }
02051     else {
02052         sprintf(filename, "test%05i.txt", count);
02053     }
02054     f = BLI_fopen(filename, "w");
02055 
02056     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next)
02057     {
02058         int i;
02059         float p[3];
02060         
02061         exportNode(f, "v1", arc->head);
02062         
02063         for (i = 0; i < arc->bcount; i++)
02064         {
02065             fprintf(f, "b nv:%i %f %f %f\n", arc->buckets[i].nv, arc->buckets[i].p[0], arc->buckets[i].p[1], arc->buckets[i].p[2]);
02066         }
02067         
02068         add_v3_v3v3(p, arc->tail->p, arc->head->p);
02069         mul_v3_fl(p, 0.5f);
02070         
02071         fprintf(f, "angle %0.3f %0.3f %0.3f %0.3f %i\n", p[0], p[1], p[2], arc->angle, BLI_ghash_size(arc->faces));
02072         exportNode(f, "v2", arc->tail);
02073     }   
02074     
02075     fclose(f);
02076 }
02077 
02078 /***************************************** MAIN ALGORITHM **********************************************/
02079 
02080 /* edges alone will create zero degree nodes, use this function to remove them */
02081 static void removeZeroNodes(ReebGraph *rg)
02082 {
02083     ReebNode *node, *next_node;
02084     
02085     for (node = rg->nodes.first; node; node = next_node)
02086     {
02087         next_node = node->next;
02088         
02089         if (node->degree == 0)
02090         {
02091             BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)node);
02092         }
02093     }
02094 }
02095 
02096 void removeNormalNodes(ReebGraph *rg)
02097 {
02098     ReebArc *arc, *nextArc;
02099     
02100     // Merge degree 2 nodes
02101     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = nextArc)
02102     {
02103         nextArc = arc->next;
02104         
02105         while (arc->head->degree == 2 || arc->tail->degree == 2)
02106         {
02107             // merge at v1
02108             if (arc->head->degree == 2)
02109             {
02110                 ReebArc *connectedArc = (ReebArc*)BLI_findConnectedArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)arc, (BNode*)arc->head);
02111 
02112                 /* If arcs are one after the other */
02113                 if (arc->head == connectedArc->tail)
02114                 {       
02115                     /* remove furthest arc */       
02116                     if (arc->tail->weight < connectedArc->head->weight)
02117                     {
02118                         mergeConnectedArcs(rg, arc, connectedArc);
02119                         nextArc = arc->next;
02120                     }
02121                     else
02122                     {
02123                         mergeConnectedArcs(rg, connectedArc, arc);
02124                         break; /* arc was removed, move to next */
02125                     }
02126                 }
02127                 /* Otherwise, arcs are side by side */
02128                 else
02129                 {
02130                     /* Don't do anything, we need to keep the lowest node, even if degree 2 */
02131                     break;
02132                 }
02133             }
02134             
02135             // merge at v2
02136             if (arc->tail->degree == 2)
02137             {
02138                 ReebArc *connectedArc = (ReebArc*)BLI_findConnectedArc((BGraph*)rg, (BArc*)arc, (BNode*)arc->tail);
02139                 
02140                 /* If arcs are one after the other */
02141                 if (arc->tail == connectedArc->head)
02142                 {               
02143                     /* remove furthest arc */       
02144                     if (arc->head->weight < connectedArc->tail->weight)
02145                     {
02146                         mergeConnectedArcs(rg, arc, connectedArc);
02147                         nextArc = arc->next;
02148                     }
02149                     else
02150                     {
02151                         mergeConnectedArcs(rg, connectedArc, arc);
02152                         break; /* arc was removed, move to next */
02153                     }
02154                 }
02155                 /* Otherwise, arcs are side by side */
02156                 else
02157                 {
02158                     /* Don't do anything, we need to keep the lowest node, even if degree 2 */
02159                     break;
02160                 }
02161             }
02162         }
02163     }
02164     
02165 }
02166 
02167 static int edgeEquals(ReebEdge *e1, ReebEdge *e2)
02168 {
02169     return (e1->v1 == e2->v1 && e1->v2 == e2->v2);
02170 }
02171 
02172 static ReebArc *nextArcMappedToEdge(ReebArc *arc, ReebEdge *e)
02173 {
02174     ReebEdge *nextEdge = NULL;
02175     ReebEdge *edge = NULL;
02176     ReebArc *result = NULL;
02177 
02178     /* Find the ReebEdge in the edge list */
02179     for (edge = arc->edges.first; edge && !edgeEquals(edge, e); edge = edge->next)
02180     {   }
02181     
02182     nextEdge = edge->nextEdge;
02183     
02184     if (nextEdge != NULL)
02185     {
02186         result = nextEdge->arc;
02187     }
02188 
02189     return result;
02190 }
02191 
02192 void addFacetoArc(ReebArc *arc, EditFace *efa)
02193 {
02194     BLI_ghash_insert(arc->faces, efa, efa);
02195 }
02196 
02197 void mergeArcFaces(ReebGraph *UNUSED(rg), ReebArc *aDst, ReebArc *aSrc)
02198 {
02199     GHashIterator ghi;
02200     
02201     for (BLI_ghashIterator_init(&ghi, aSrc->faces);
02202         !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(&ghi);
02203         BLI_ghashIterator_step(&ghi))
02204     {
02205         EditFace *efa = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(&ghi);
02206         BLI_ghash_insert(aDst->faces, efa, efa);
02207     }
02208 } 
02209 
02210 void mergeArcEdges(ReebGraph *rg, ReebArc *aDst, ReebArc *aSrc, MergeDirection direction)
02211 {
02212     ReebEdge *e = NULL;
02213     
02214     if (direction == MERGE_APPEND)
02215     {
02216         for (e = aSrc->edges.first; e; e = e->next)
02217         {
02218             e->arc = aDst; // Edge is stolen by new arc
02219         }
02220         
02221         BLI_movelisttolist(&aDst->edges , &aSrc->edges);
02222     }
02223     else
02224     {
02225         for (e = aSrc->edges.first; e; e = e->next)
02226         {
02227             ReebEdge *newEdge = copyEdge(e);
02228 
02229             newEdge->arc = aDst;
02230             
02231             BLI_addtail(&aDst->edges, newEdge);
02232             
02233             if (direction == MERGE_LOWER)
02234             {
02235                 void **p = BLI_edgehash_lookup_p(rg->emap, e->v1->index, e->v2->index);
02236                 
02237                 newEdge->nextEdge = e;
02238 
02239                 // if edge was the first in the list, point the edit edge to the new reeb edge instead.                         
02240                 if (*p == e)
02241                 {
02242                     *p = (void*)newEdge;
02243                 }
02244                 // otherwise, advance in the list until the predecessor is found then insert it there
02245                 else
02246                 {
02247                     ReebEdge *previous = (ReebEdge*)*p;
02248                     
02249                     while (previous->nextEdge != e)
02250                     {
02251                         previous = previous->nextEdge;
02252                     }
02253                     
02254                     previous->nextEdge = newEdge;
02255                 }
02256             }
02257             else
02258             {
02259                 newEdge->nextEdge = e->nextEdge;
02260                 e->nextEdge = newEdge;
02261             }
02262         }
02263     }
02264 } 
02265 
02266 // return 1 on full merge
02267 int mergeConnectedArcs(ReebGraph *rg, ReebArc *a0, ReebArc *a1)
02268 {
02269     int result = 0;
02270     ReebNode *removedNode = NULL;
02271     
02272     a0->length += a1->length;
02273     
02274     mergeArcEdges(rg, a0, a1, MERGE_APPEND);
02275     mergeArcFaces(rg, a0, a1);
02276     
02277     // Bring a0 to the combine length of both arcs
02278     if (a0->tail == a1->head)
02279     {
02280         removedNode = a0->tail;
02281         a0->tail = a1->tail;
02282     }
02283     else if (a0->head == a1->tail)
02284     {
02285         removedNode = a0->head;
02286         a0->head = a1->head;
02287     }
02288     
02289     resizeArcBuckets(a0);
02290     // Merge a1 in a0
02291     mergeArcBuckets(a0, a1, a0->head->weight, a0->tail->weight);
02292     
02293     // remove a1 from graph
02294     BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, a1);
02295     REEB_freeArc((BArc*)a1);
02296     
02297     BLI_removeNode((BGraph*)rg, (BNode*)removedNode);
02298     result = 1;
02299     
02300     return result;
02301 }
02302 // return 1 on full merge
02303 int mergeArcs(ReebGraph *rg, ReebArc *a0, ReebArc *a1)
02304 {
02305     int result = 0;
02306     // TRIANGLE POINTS DOWN
02307     if (a0->head->weight == a1->head->weight) // heads are the same
02308     {
02309         if (a0->tail->weight == a1->tail->weight) // tails also the same, arcs can be totally merge together
02310         {
02311             mergeArcEdges(rg, a0, a1, MERGE_APPEND);
02312             mergeArcFaces(rg, a0, a1);
02313             
02314             mergeArcBuckets(a0, a1, a0->head->weight, a0->tail->weight);
02315             
02316             // Adjust node degree
02317             //a1->head->degree--;
02318             NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, a1->head);
02319             //a1->tail->degree--;
02320             NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, a1->tail);
02321             
02322             // remove a1 from graph
02323             BLI_remlink(&rg->arcs, a1);
02324             
02325             REEB_freeArc((BArc*)a1);
02326             result = 1;
02327         }
02328         else if (a0->tail->weight > a1->tail->weight) // a1->tail->weight is in the middle
02329         {
02330             mergeArcEdges(rg, a1, a0, MERGE_LOWER);
02331             mergeArcFaces(rg, a1, a0);
02332 
02333             // Adjust node degree
02334             //a0->head->degree--;
02335             NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, a0->head);
02336             //a1->tail->degree++;
02337             NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, a1->tail);
02338             
02339             mergeArcBuckets(a1, a0, a1->head->weight, a1->tail->weight);
02340             a0->head = a1->tail;
02341             resizeArcBuckets(a0);
02342         }
02343         else // a0>n2 is in the middle
02344         {
02345             mergeArcEdges(rg, a0, a1, MERGE_LOWER);
02346             mergeArcFaces(rg, a0, a1);
02347             
02348             // Adjust node degree
02349             //a1->head->degree--;
02350             NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, a1->head);
02351             //a0->tail->degree++;
02352             NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, a0->tail);
02353             
02354             mergeArcBuckets(a0, a1, a0->head->weight, a0->tail->weight);
02355             a1->head = a0->tail;
02356             resizeArcBuckets(a1);
02357         }
02358     }
02359     // TRIANGLE POINTS UP
02360     else if (a0->tail->weight == a1->tail->weight) // tails are the same
02361     {
02362         if (a0->head->weight > a1->head->weight) // a0->head->weight is in the middle
02363         {
02364             mergeArcEdges(rg, a0, a1, MERGE_HIGHER);
02365             mergeArcFaces(rg, a0, a1);
02366             
02367             // Adjust node degree
02368             //a1->tail->degree--;
02369             NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, a1->tail);
02370             //a0->head->degree++;
02371             NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, a0->head);
02372             
02373             mergeArcBuckets(a0, a1, a0->head->weight, a0->tail->weight);
02374             a1->tail = a0->head;
02375             resizeArcBuckets(a1);
02376         }
02377         else // a1->head->weight is in the middle
02378         {
02379             mergeArcEdges(rg, a1, a0, MERGE_HIGHER);
02380             mergeArcFaces(rg, a1, a0);
02381 
02382             // Adjust node degree
02383             //a0->tail->degree--;
02384             NodeDegreeDecrement(rg, a0->tail);
02385             //a1->head->degree++;
02386             NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, a1->head);
02387 
02388             mergeArcBuckets(a1, a0, a1->head->weight, a1->tail->weight);
02389             a0->tail = a1->head;
02390             resizeArcBuckets(a0);
02391         }
02392     }
02393     else
02394     {
02395         // Need something here (OR NOT)
02396     }
02397     
02398     return result;
02399 }
02400 
02401 static void glueByMergeSort(ReebGraph *rg, ReebArc *a0, ReebArc *a1, ReebEdge *e0, ReebEdge *e1)
02402 {
02403     int total = 0;
02404     while (total == 0 && a0 != a1 && a0 != NULL && a1 != NULL)
02405     {
02406         total = mergeArcs(rg, a0, a1);
02407         
02408         if (total == 0) // if it wasn't a total merge, go forward
02409         {
02410             if (a0->tail->weight < a1->tail->weight)
02411             {
02412                 a0 = nextArcMappedToEdge(a0, e0);
02413             }
02414             else
02415             {
02416                 a1 = nextArcMappedToEdge(a1, e1);
02417             }
02418         }
02419     }
02420 }
02421 
02422 static void mergePaths(ReebGraph *rg, ReebEdge *e0, ReebEdge *e1, ReebEdge *e2)
02423 {
02424     ReebArc *a0, *a1, *a2;
02425     a0 = e0->arc;
02426     a1 = e1->arc;
02427     a2 = e2->arc;
02428     
02429     glueByMergeSort(rg, a0, a1, e0, e1);
02430     glueByMergeSort(rg, a0, a2, e0, e2);
02431 } 
02432 
02433 static ReebEdge * createArc(ReebGraph *rg, ReebNode *node1, ReebNode *node2)
02434 {
02435     ReebEdge *edge;
02436     
02437     edge = BLI_edgehash_lookup(rg->emap, node1->index, node2->index);
02438     
02439     // Only add existing edges that haven't been added yet
02440     if (edge == NULL)
02441     {
02442         ReebArc *arc;
02443         ReebNode *v1, *v2;
02444         float len, offset;
02445         int i;
02446         
02447         arc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ReebArc), "reeb arc");
02448         edge = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ReebEdge), "reeb edge");
02449         
02450         arc->flag = 0; // clear flag on init
02451         arc->symmetry_level = 0;
02452         arc->faces = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "createArc gh");
02453         
02454         if (node1->weight <= node2->weight)
02455         {
02456             v1 = node1; 
02457             v2 = node2; 
02458         }
02459         else
02460         {
02461             v1 = node2; 
02462             v2 = node1; 
02463         }
02464         
02465         arc->head = v1;
02466         arc->tail = v2;
02467         
02468         // increase node degree
02469         //v1->degree++;
02470         NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, v1);
02471         //v2->degree++;
02472         NodeDegreeIncrement(rg, v2);
02473 
02474         BLI_edgehash_insert(rg->emap, node1->index, node2->index, edge);
02475         
02476         edge->arc = arc;
02477         edge->nextEdge = NULL;
02478         edge->v1 = v1;
02479         edge->v2 = v2;
02480         
02481         BLI_addtail(&rg->arcs, arc);
02482         BLI_addtail(&arc->edges, edge);
02483         
02484         /* adding buckets for embedding */
02485         allocArcBuckets(arc);
02486         
02487         offset = arc->head->weight;
02488         len = arc->tail->weight - arc->head->weight;
02489 
02490 #if 0
02491         /* This is the actual embedding filling described in the paper
02492          * the problem is that it only works with really dense meshes
02493          */
02494         if (arc->bcount > 0)
02495         {
02496             addVertToBucket(&(arc->buckets[0]), arc->head->co);
02497             addVertToBucket(&(arc->buckets[arc->bcount - 1]), arc->tail->co);
02498         }
02499 #else
02500         for (i = 0; i < arc->bcount; i++)
02501         {
02502             float co[3];
02503             float f = (arc->buckets[i].val - offset) / len;
02504             
02505             interp_v3_v3v3(co, v1->p, v2->p, f);
02506             addVertToBucket(&(arc->buckets[i]), co);
02507         }
02508 #endif
02509 
02510     }
02511     
02512     return edge;
02513 }
02514 
02515 static void addTriangleToGraph(ReebGraph *rg, ReebNode * n1, ReebNode * n2, ReebNode * n3, EditFace *efa)
02516 {
02517     ReebEdge *re1, *re2, *re3;
02518     ReebEdge *e1, *e2, *e3;
02519     float len1, len2, len3;
02520     
02521     re1 = createArc(rg, n1, n2);
02522     re2 = createArc(rg, n2, n3);
02523     re3 = createArc(rg, n3, n1);
02524     
02525     addFacetoArc(re1->arc, efa);
02526     addFacetoArc(re2->arc, efa);
02527     addFacetoArc(re3->arc, efa);
02528     
02529     len1 = (float)fabs(n1->weight - n2->weight);
02530     len2 = (float)fabs(n2->weight - n3->weight);
02531     len3 = (float)fabs(n3->weight - n1->weight);
02532     
02533     /* The rest of the algorithm assumes that e1 is the longest edge */
02534     
02535     if (len1 >= len2 && len1 >= len3)
02536     {
02537         e1 = re1;
02538         e2 = re2;
02539         e3 = re3;
02540     }
02541     else if (len2 >= len1 && len2 >= len3)
02542     {
02543         e1 = re2;
02544         e2 = re1;
02545         e3 = re3;
02546     }
02547     else
02548     {
02549         e1 = re3;
02550         e2 = re2;
02551         e3 = re1;
02552     }
02553     
02554     /* And e2 is the lowest edge
02555      * If e3 is lower than e2, swap them
02556      */
02557     if (e3->v1->weight < e2->v1->weight)
02558     {
02559         ReebEdge *etmp = e2;
02560         e2 = e3;
02561         e3 = etmp;
02562     }
02563     
02564     
02565     mergePaths(rg, e1, e2, e3);
02566 }
02567 
02568 ReebGraph * generateReebGraph(EditMesh *em, int subdivisions)
02569 {
02570     ReebGraph *rg;
02571     EditVert *eve;
02572     EditFace *efa;
02573     int index;
02574     /*int totvert;*/
02575     
02576 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
02577     int totfaces;
02578     int countfaces = 0;
02579 #endif
02580 
02581     rg = newReebGraph();
02582     
02583     rg->resolution = subdivisions;
02584     
02585     /*totvert = BLI_countlist(&em->verts);*/ /*UNUSED*/
02586 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
02587     totfaces = BLI_countlist(&em->faces);
02588 #endif
02589     
02590     renormalizeWeight(em, 1.0f);
02591     
02592     /* Spread weight to minimize errors */
02593     spreadWeight(em);
02594 
02595     renormalizeWeight(em, (float)rg->resolution);
02596 
02597     /* Adding vertice */
02598     for (index = 0, eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
02599     {
02600         if (eve->h == 0)
02601         {
02602             addNode(rg, eve);
02603             eve->f2 = 0;
02604             index++;
02605         }
02606     }
02607     
02608     /* Adding face, edge per edge */
02609     for (efa = em->faces.first; efa; efa = efa->next)
02610     {
02611         if (efa->h == 0)
02612         {
02613             ReebNode *n1, *n2, *n3;
02614             
02615             n1 = nodeData(efa->v1);
02616             n2 = nodeData(efa->v2);
02617             n3 = nodeData(efa->v3);
02618             
02619             addTriangleToGraph(rg, n1, n2, n3, efa);
02620             
02621             if (efa->v4)
02622             {
02623                 ReebNode *n4 = nodeData(efa->v4);
02624                 addTriangleToGraph(rg, n1, n3, n4, efa);
02625             }
02626 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
02627             countfaces++;
02628             if (countfaces % 100 == 0)
02629             {
02630                 printf("\rface %i of %i", countfaces, totfaces);
02631             }
02632 #endif
02633         }
02634     }
02635     
02636     printf("\n");
02637     
02638     removeZeroNodes(rg);
02639     
02640     removeNormalNodes(rg);
02641     
02642     return rg;
02643 }
02644 
02645 /***************************************** WEIGHT UTILS **********************************************/
02646 
02647 void renormalizeWeight(EditMesh *em, float newmax)
02648 {
02649     EditVert *eve;
02650     float minimum, maximum, range;
02651     
02652     if (em == NULL || BLI_countlist(&em->verts) == 0)
02653         return;
02654 
02655     /* First pass, determine maximum and minimum */
02656     eve = em->verts.first;
02657     minimum = weightData(eve);
02658     maximum = minimum;
02659     for (; eve; eve = eve->next)
02660     {
02661         maximum = MAX2(maximum, weightData(eve));
02662         minimum = MIN2(minimum, weightData(eve));
02663     }
02664     
02665     range = maximum - minimum;
02666 
02667     /* Normalize weights */
02668     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
02669     {
02670         float weight = (weightData(eve) - minimum) / range * newmax;
02671         weightSetData(eve, weight);
02672     }
02673 }
02674 
02675 
02676 int weightFromLoc(EditMesh *em, int axis)
02677 {
02678     EditVert *eve;
02679     
02680     if (em == NULL || BLI_countlist(&em->verts) == 0 || axis < 0 || axis > 2)
02681         return 0;
02682 
02683     /* Copy coordinate in weight */
02684     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
02685     {
02686         weightSetData(eve, eve->co[axis]);
02687     }
02688 
02689     return 1;
02690 }
02691 
02692 static float cotan_weight(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3)
02693 {
02694     float a[3], b[3], c[3], clen;
02695 
02696     sub_v3_v3v3(a, v2, v1);
02697     sub_v3_v3v3(b, v3, v1);
02698     cross_v3_v3v3(c, a, b);
02699 
02700     clen = len_v3(c);
02701 
02702     if (clen == 0.0f)
02703         return 0.0f;
02704     
02705     return dot_v3v3(a, b)/clen;
02706 }
02707 
02708 static void addTriangle(EditVert *v1, EditVert *v2, EditVert *v3, int e1, int e2, int e3)
02709 {
02710     /* Angle opposite e1 */
02711     float t1= cotan_weight(v1->co, v2->co, v3->co) / e2;
02712     
02713     /* Angle opposite e2 */
02714     float t2 = cotan_weight(v2->co, v3->co, v1->co) / e3;
02715 
02716     /* Angle opposite e3 */
02717     float t3 = cotan_weight(v3->co, v1->co, v2->co) / e1;
02718     
02719     int i1 = indexData(v1);
02720     int i2 = indexData(v2);
02721     int i3 = indexData(v3);
02722     
02723     nlMatrixAdd(i1, i1, t2+t3);
02724     nlMatrixAdd(i2, i2, t1+t3);
02725     nlMatrixAdd(i3, i3, t1+t2);
02726 
02727     nlMatrixAdd(i1, i2, -t3);
02728     nlMatrixAdd(i2, i1, -t3);
02729 
02730     nlMatrixAdd(i2, i3, -t1);
02731     nlMatrixAdd(i3, i2, -t1);
02732 
02733     nlMatrixAdd(i3, i1, -t2);
02734     nlMatrixAdd(i1, i3, -t2);
02735 }
02736 
02737 int weightToHarmonic(EditMesh *em, EdgeIndex *indexed_edges)
02738 {
02739     NLboolean success;
02740     EditVert *eve;
02741     EditEdge *eed;
02742     EditFace *efa;
02743     int totvert = 0;
02744     int index;
02745     int rval;
02746     
02747     /* Find local extrema */
02748     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
02749     {
02750         totvert++;
02751     }
02752 
02753     /* Solve with openNL */
02754     
02755     nlNewContext();
02756 
02757     nlSolverParameteri(NL_NB_VARIABLES, totvert);
02758 
02759     nlBegin(NL_SYSTEM);
02760     
02761     /* Find local extrema */
02762     for (index = 0, eve = em->verts.first; eve; index++, eve = eve->next)
02763     {
02764         if (eve->h == 0)
02765         {
02766             EditEdge *eed;
02767             int maximum = 1;
02768             int minimum = 1;
02769             
02770             NextEdgeForVert(indexed_edges, -1); /* Reset next edge */
02771             for (eed = NextEdgeForVert(indexed_edges, index); eed && (maximum || minimum); eed = NextEdgeForVert(indexed_edges, index))
02772             {
02773                 EditVert *eve2;
02774                 
02775                 if (eed->v1 == eve)
02776                 {
02777                     eve2 = eed->v2;
02778                 }
02779                 else
02780                 {
02781                     eve2 = eed->v1;
02782                 }
02783                 
02784                 if (eve2->h == 0)
02785                 {
02786                     /* Adjacent vertex is bigger, not a local maximum */
02787                     if (weightData(eve2) > weightData(eve))
02788                     {
02789                         maximum = 0;
02790                     }
02791                     /* Adjacent vertex is smaller, not a local minimum */
02792                     else if (weightData(eve2) < weightData(eve))
02793                     {
02794                         minimum = 0;
02795                     }
02796                 }
02797             }
02798             
02799             if (maximum || minimum)
02800             {
02801                 float w = weightData(eve);
02802                 eve->f1 = 0;
02803                 nlSetVariable(0, index, w);
02804                 nlLockVariable(index);
02805             }
02806             else
02807             {
02808                 eve->f1 = 1;
02809             }
02810         }
02811     }
02812     
02813     nlBegin(NL_MATRIX);
02814 
02815     /* Zero edge weight */
02816     for (eed = em->edges.first; eed; eed = eed->next)
02817     {
02818         eed->tmp.l = 0;
02819     }
02820     
02821     /* Add faces count to the edge weight */
02822     for (efa = em->faces.first; efa; efa = efa->next)
02823     {
02824         if (efa->h == 0)
02825         {
02826             efa->e1->tmp.l++;
02827             efa->e2->tmp.l++;
02828             efa->e3->tmp.l++;
02829             
02830             if (efa->e4)
02831             {
02832                 efa->e4->tmp.l++;
02833             }
02834         }
02835     }
02836 
02837     /* Add faces angle to the edge weight */
02838     for (efa = em->faces.first; efa; efa = efa->next)
02839     {
02840         if (efa->h == 0)
02841         {
02842             if (efa->v4 == NULL)
02843             {
02844                 addTriangle(efa->v1, efa->v2, efa->v3, efa->e1->tmp.l, efa->e2->tmp.l, efa->e3->tmp.l);
02845             }
02846             else
02847             {
02848                 addTriangle(efa->v1, efa->v2, efa->v3, efa->e1->tmp.l, efa->e2->tmp.l, 2);
02849                 addTriangle(efa->v3, efa->v4, efa->v1, efa->e3->tmp.l, efa->e4->tmp.l, 2);
02850             }
02851         }
02852     }
02853     
02854     nlEnd(NL_MATRIX);
02855 
02856     nlEnd(NL_SYSTEM);
02857 
02858     success = nlSolveAdvanced(NULL, NL_TRUE);
02859 
02860     if (success)
02861     {
02862         rval = 1;
02863         for (index = 0, eve = em->verts.first; eve; index++, eve = eve->next)
02864         {
02865             weightSetData(eve, nlGetVariable(0, index));
02866         }
02867     }
02868     else
02869     {
02870         rval = 0;
02871     }
02872 
02873     nlDeleteContext(nlGetCurrent());
02874 
02875     return rval;
02876 }
02877 
02878 
02879 EditEdge * NextEdgeForVert(EdgeIndex *indexed_edges, int index)
02880 {
02881     static int offset = -1;
02882     
02883     /* Reset method, call with NULL mesh pointer */
02884     if (index == -1)
02885     {
02886         offset = -1;
02887         return NULL;
02888     }
02889     
02890     /* first pass, start at the head of the list */
02891     if (offset == -1)
02892     {
02893         offset = indexed_edges->offset[index];
02894     }
02895     /* subsequent passes, start on the next edge */
02896     else
02897     {
02898         offset++;
02899     }
02900     
02901     return indexed_edges->edges[offset];
02902 }
02903 
02904 static void shortestPathsFromVert(EditMesh *em, EditVert *starting_vert, EdgeIndex *indexed_edges)
02905 {
02906     Heap     *edge_heap;
02907     EditVert *current_eve = NULL;
02908     EditEdge *eed = NULL;
02909     EditEdge *select_eed = NULL;
02910     
02911     edge_heap = BLI_heap_new();
02912     
02913     current_eve = starting_vert;
02914     
02915     /* insert guard in heap, when that is returned, no more edges */
02916     BLI_heap_insert(edge_heap, FLT_MAX, NULL);
02917 
02918     /* Initialize edge flag */
02919     for (eed= em->edges.first; eed; eed= eed->next)
02920     {
02921         eed->f1 = 0;
02922     }
02923     
02924     while (BLI_heap_size(edge_heap) > 0)
02925     {
02926         float current_weight;
02927         
02928         current_eve->f1 = 1; /* mark vertex as selected */
02929         
02930         /* Add all new edges connected to current_eve to the list */
02931         NextEdgeForVert(indexed_edges, -1); // Reset next edge
02932         for (eed = NextEdgeForVert(indexed_edges, indexData(current_eve)); eed; eed = NextEdgeForVert(indexed_edges, indexData(current_eve)))
02933         { 
02934             if (eed->f1 == 0)
02935             {
02936                 BLI_heap_insert(edge_heap, weightData(current_eve) + eed->tmp.fp, eed);
02937                 eed->f1 = 1;
02938             }
02939         }
02940         
02941         /* Find next shortest edge with unselected verts */
02942         do
02943         {
02944             current_weight = BLI_heap_node_value(BLI_heap_top(edge_heap));
02945             select_eed = BLI_heap_popmin(edge_heap);
02946         } while (select_eed != NULL && select_eed->v1->f1 != 0 && select_eed->v2->f1);
02947         
02948         if (select_eed != NULL)
02949         {
02950             select_eed->f1 = 2;
02951             
02952             if (select_eed->v1->f1 == 0) /* v1 is the new vertex */
02953             {
02954                 current_eve = select_eed->v1;
02955             }
02956             else /* otherwise, it's v2 */
02957             {
02958                 current_eve = select_eed->v2;
02959             }
02960             
02961             weightSetData(current_eve, current_weight);
02962         }
02963     }
02964     
02965     BLI_heap_free(edge_heap, NULL);
02966 }
02967 
02968 static void freeEdgeIndex(EdgeIndex *indexed_edges)
02969 {
02970     MEM_freeN(indexed_edges->offset);
02971     MEM_freeN(indexed_edges->edges);
02972 }
02973 
02974 static void buildIndexedEdges(EditMesh *em, EdgeIndex *indexed_edges)
02975 {
02976     EditVert *eve;
02977     EditEdge *eed;
02978     int totvert = 0;
02979     int tot_indexed = 0;
02980     int offset = 0;
02981 
02982     totvert = BLI_countlist(&em->verts);
02983 
02984     indexed_edges->offset = MEM_callocN(totvert * sizeof(int), "EdgeIndex offset");
02985 
02986     for (eed = em->edges.first; eed; eed = eed->next)
02987     {
02988         if (eed->v1->h == 0 && eed->v2->h == 0)
02989         {
02990             tot_indexed += 2;
02991             indexed_edges->offset[indexData(eed->v1)]++;
02992             indexed_edges->offset[indexData(eed->v2)]++;
02993         }
02994     }
02995     
02996     tot_indexed += totvert;
02997 
02998     indexed_edges->edges = MEM_callocN(tot_indexed * sizeof(EditEdge*), "EdgeIndex edges");
02999 
03000     /* setting vert offsets */
03001     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
03002     {
03003         if (eve->h == 0)
03004         {
03005             int d = indexed_edges->offset[indexData(eve)];
03006             indexed_edges->offset[indexData(eve)] = offset;
03007             offset += d + 1;
03008         }
03009     }
03010 
03011     /* adding edges in array */
03012     for (eed = em->edges.first; eed; eed= eed->next)
03013     {
03014         if (eed->v1->h == 0 && eed->v2->h == 0)
03015         {
03016             int i;
03017             for (i = indexed_edges->offset[indexData(eed->v1)]; i < tot_indexed; i++)
03018             {
03019                 if (indexed_edges->edges[i] == NULL)
03020                 {
03021                     indexed_edges->edges[i] = eed;
03022                     break;
03023                 }
03024             }
03025             
03026             for (i = indexed_edges->offset[indexData(eed->v2)]; i < tot_indexed; i++)
03027             {
03028                 if (indexed_edges->edges[i] == NULL)
03029                 {
03030                     indexed_edges->edges[i] = eed;
03031                     break;
03032                 }
03033             }
03034         }
03035     }
03036 }
03037 
03038 int weightFromDistance(EditMesh *em, EdgeIndex *indexed_edges)
03039 {
03040     EditVert *eve;
03041     int totedge = 0;
03042     int totvert = 0;
03043     int vCount = 0;
03044     
03045     totvert = BLI_countlist(&em->verts);
03046     
03047     if (em == NULL || totvert == 0)
03048     {
03049         return 0;
03050     }
03051     
03052     totedge = BLI_countlist(&em->edges);
03053     
03054     if (totedge == 0)
03055     {
03056         return 0;
03057     }
03058     
03059     /* Initialize vertice flag and find at least one selected vertex */
03060     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
03061     {
03062         eve->f1 = 0;
03063         if (eve->f & SELECT)
03064         {
03065             vCount = 1;
03066         }
03067     }
03068     
03069     if (vCount == 0)
03070     {
03071         return 0; /* no selected vert, failure */
03072     }
03073     else
03074     {
03075         EditEdge *eed;
03076         int allDone = 0;
03077 
03078         /* Calculate edge weight */
03079         for (eed = em->edges.first; eed; eed= eed->next)
03080         {
03081             if (eed->v1->h == 0 && eed->v2->h == 0)
03082             {
03083                 eed->tmp.fp = len_v3v3(eed->v1->co, eed->v2->co);
03084             }
03085         }
03086 
03087         /* Apply dijkstra spf for each selected vert */
03088         for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
03089         {
03090             if (eve->f & SELECT)
03091             {
03092                 shortestPathsFromVert(em, eve, indexed_edges);              
03093             }
03094         }
03095         
03096         /* connect unselected islands */
03097         while (allDone == 0)
03098         {
03099             EditVert *selected_eve = NULL;
03100             float selected_weight = 0;
03101             float min_distance = FLT_MAX;
03102             
03103             allDone = 1;
03104             
03105             for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next)
03106             {
03107                 /* for every vertex visible that hasn't been processed yet */
03108                 if (eve->h == 0 && eve->f1 != 1)
03109                 {
03110                     EditVert *closest_eve;
03111                     
03112                     /* find the closest processed vertex */
03113                     for (closest_eve = em->verts.first; closest_eve; closest_eve = closest_eve->next)
03114                     {
03115                         /* vertex is already processed and distance is smaller than current minimum */
03116                         if (closest_eve->f1 == 1)
03117                         {
03118                             float distance = len_v3v3(closest_eve->co, eve->co);
03119                             if (distance < min_distance)
03120                             {
03121                                 min_distance = distance;
03122                                 selected_eve = eve;
03123                                 selected_weight = weightData(closest_eve);
03124                             }
03125                         }
03126                     }
03127                 }
03128             }
03129             
03130             if (selected_eve)
03131             {
03132                 allDone = 0;
03133 
03134                 weightSetData(selected_eve, selected_weight + min_distance);
03135                 shortestPathsFromVert(em, selected_eve, indexed_edges);
03136             }
03137         }
03138     }
03139 
03140     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve && vCount == 0; eve = eve->next)
03141     {
03142         if (eve->f1 == 0)
03143         {
03144             printf("vertex not reached\n");
03145             break;
03146         }
03147     }
03148     
03149     return 1;
03150 }
03151 #endif
03152 
03153 /****************************************** BUCKET ITERATOR **************************************************/
03154 
03155 static void* headNode(void *arg);
03156 static void* tailNode(void *arg);
03157 static void* nextBucket(void *arg);
03158 static void* nextNBucket(void *arg, int n);
03159 static void* peekBucket(void *arg, int n);
03160 static void* previousBucket(void *arg);
03161 static int   iteratorStopped(void *arg);
03162 
03163 static void initIteratorFct(ReebArcIterator *iter)
03164 {
03165     iter->head = headNode;
03166     iter->tail = tailNode;
03167     iter->peek = peekBucket;
03168     iter->next = nextBucket;
03169     iter->nextN = nextNBucket;
03170     iter->previous = previousBucket;
03171     iter->stopped = iteratorStopped;    
03172 }
03173 
03174 static void setIteratorValues(ReebArcIterator *iter, EmbedBucket *bucket)
03175 {
03176     if (bucket)
03177     {
03178         iter->p = bucket->p;
03179         iter->no = bucket->no;
03180     }
03181     else
03182     {
03183         iter->p = NULL;
03184         iter->no = NULL;
03185     }
03186     iter->size = 0;
03187 }
03188 
03189 void initArcIterator(BArcIterator *arg, ReebArc *arc, ReebNode *head)
03190 {
03191     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03192 
03193     initIteratorFct(iter);
03194     iter->arc = arc;
03195     
03196     if (head == arc->head)
03197     {
03198         iter->start = 0;
03199         iter->end = arc->bcount - 1;
03200         iter->stride = 1;
03201     }
03202     else
03203     {
03204         iter->start = arc->bcount - 1;
03205         iter->end = 0;
03206         iter->stride = -1;
03207     }
03208     
03209     iter->length = arc->bcount;
03210     
03211     iter->index = -1;
03212 }
03213 
03214 void initArcIteratorStart(BArcIterator *arg, struct ReebArc *arc, struct ReebNode *head, int start)
03215 {
03216     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03217 
03218     initIteratorFct(iter);
03219     iter->arc = arc;
03220     
03221     if (head == arc->head)
03222     {
03223         iter->start = start;
03224         iter->end = arc->bcount - 1;
03225         iter->stride = 1;
03226     }
03227     else
03228     {
03229         iter->start = arc->bcount - 1 - start;
03230         iter->end = 0;
03231         iter->stride = -1;
03232     }
03233     
03234     iter->index = -1;
03235     
03236     iter->length = arc->bcount - start;
03237 
03238     if (start >= arc->bcount)
03239     {
03240         iter->start = iter->end; /* stop iterator since it's past its end */
03241     }
03242 }
03243 
03244 void initArcIterator2(BArcIterator *arg, ReebArc *arc, int start, int end)
03245 {
03246     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03247 
03248     initIteratorFct(iter);
03249     iter->arc = arc;
03250     
03251     iter->start = start;
03252     iter->end = end;
03253     
03254     if (end > start)
03255     {
03256         iter->stride = 1;
03257     }
03258     else
03259     {
03260         iter->stride = -1;
03261     }
03262 
03263     iter->index = -1;
03264 
03265     iter->length = abs(iter->end - iter->start) + 1;
03266 }
03267 
03268 static void* headNode(void *arg)
03269 {
03270     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03271     ReebNode *node;
03272     
03273     if (iter->start < iter->end)
03274     {
03275         node = iter->arc->head;
03276     }
03277     else
03278     {
03279         node = iter->arc->tail;
03280     }
03281     
03282     iter->p = node->p;
03283     iter->no = node->no;
03284     iter->size = 0;
03285     
03286     return node;
03287 }
03288 
03289 static void* tailNode(void *arg)
03290 {
03291     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03292     ReebNode *node;
03293     
03294     if (iter->start < iter->end)
03295     {
03296         node = iter->arc->tail;
03297     }
03298     else
03299     {
03300         node = iter->arc->head;
03301     }
03302     
03303     iter->p = node->p;
03304     iter->no = node->no;
03305     iter->size = 0;
03306     
03307     return node;
03308 }
03309 
03310 static void* nextBucket(void *arg)
03311 {
03312     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03313     EmbedBucket *result = NULL;
03314     
03315     iter->index++;
03316     
03317     if (iter->index < iter->length)
03318     {
03319         result = &(iter->arc->buckets[iter->start + (iter->stride * iter->index)]);
03320     }
03321     
03322     setIteratorValues(iter, result);
03323     return result;
03324 }
03325 
03326 static void* nextNBucket(void *arg, int n)
03327 {
03328     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03329     EmbedBucket *result = NULL;
03330         
03331     iter->index += n;
03332 
03333     /* check if passed end */
03334     if (iter->index < iter->length)
03335     {
03336         result = &(iter->arc->buckets[iter->start + (iter->stride * iter->index)]);
03337     }
03338     
03339     setIteratorValues(iter, result);
03340     return result;
03341 }
03342 
03343 static void* peekBucket(void *arg, int n)
03344 {
03345     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03346     EmbedBucket *result = NULL;
03347     int index = iter->index + n;
03348 
03349     /* check if passed end */
03350     if (index < iter->length)
03351     {
03352         result = &(iter->arc->buckets[iter->start + (iter->stride * index)]);
03353     }
03354 
03355     setIteratorValues(iter, result);
03356     return result;
03357 }
03358 
03359 static void* previousBucket(void *arg)
03360 {
03361     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03362     EmbedBucket *result = NULL;
03363     
03364     if (iter->index > 0)
03365     {
03366         iter->index--;
03367         result = &(iter->arc->buckets[iter->start + (iter->stride * iter->index)]);
03368     }
03369 
03370     setIteratorValues(iter, result);
03371     return result;
03372 }
03373 
03374 static int iteratorStopped(void *arg)
03375 {
03376     ReebArcIterator *iter = (ReebArcIterator*)arg;
03377 
03378     if (iter->index >= iter->length)
03379     {
03380         return 1;
03381     }
03382     else
03383     {
03384         return 0;
03385     }
03386 }
03387 
03388 /************************ PUBLIC FUNCTIONS *********************************************/
03389 
03390 ReebGraph *BIF_ReebGraphMultiFromEditMesh(bContext *C)
03391 {
03392     (void)C;
03393     return NULL;
03394 #if 0
03395     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03396     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
03397     EditMesh *em = BKE_mesh_get_editmesh(((Mesh*)obedit->data));
03398     EdgeIndex indexed_edges;
03399     VertexData *data;
03400     ReebGraph *rg = NULL;
03401     ReebGraph *rgi, *previous;
03402     int i, nb_levels = REEB_MAX_MULTI_LEVEL;
03403 
03404     if (em == NULL)
03405         return NULL;
03406     
03407     data = allocVertexData(em);
03408 
03409     buildIndexedEdges(em, &indexed_edges);
03410 
03411     if (weightFromDistance(em, &indexed_edges) == 0)
03412     {
03413         // XXX error("No selected vertex\n");
03414         freeEdgeIndex(&indexed_edges);
03415         return NULL;
03416     }
03417     
03418     renormalizeWeight(em, 1.0f);
03419 
03420     if (scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_HARMONIC)
03421     {
03422         weightToHarmonic(em, &indexed_edges);
03423     }
03424     
03425     freeEdgeIndex(&indexed_edges);
03426     
03427     rg = generateReebGraph(em, scene->toolsettings->skgen_resolution);
03428 
03429     /* Remove arcs without embedding */
03430     filterNullReebGraph(rg);
03431 
03432     /* smart filter and loop filter on basic level */
03433     filterGraph(rg, SKGEN_FILTER_SMART, 0, 0);
03434 
03435     repositionNodes(rg);
03436 
03437     /* Filtering might have created degree 2 nodes, so remove them */
03438     removeNormalNodes(rg);
03439     
03440     joinSubgraphs(rg, 1.0);
03441 
03442     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
03443     
03444     /* calc length before copy, so we have same length on all levels */
03445     BLI_calcGraphLength((BGraph*)rg);
03446 
03447     previous = NULL;
03448     for (i = 0; i <= nb_levels; i++)
03449     {
03450         rgi = rg;
03451         
03452         /* don't filter last level */
03453         if (i > 0)
03454         {
03455             float internal_threshold;
03456             float external_threshold;
03457 
03458             /* filter internal progressively in second half only*/
03459             if (i > nb_levels / 2)
03460             {
03461                 internal_threshold = rg->length * scene->toolsettings->skgen_threshold_internal;
03462             }
03463             else
03464             {
03465                 internal_threshold = rg->length * scene->toolsettings->skgen_threshold_internal * (2 * i / (float)nb_levels);
03466             }
03467             
03468             external_threshold = rg->length * scene->toolsettings->skgen_threshold_external * (i / (float)nb_levels);
03469 
03470             filterGraph(rgi, scene->toolsettings->skgen_options, internal_threshold, external_threshold);
03471         }
03472 
03473         if (i < nb_levels)
03474         {
03475             rg = copyReebGraph(rgi, i + 1);
03476         }
03477 
03478         finalizeGraph(rgi, scene->toolsettings->skgen_postpro_passes, scene->toolsettings->skgen_postpro);
03479 
03480         BLI_markdownSymmetry((BGraph*)rgi, rgi->nodes.first, scene->toolsettings->skgen_symmetry_limit);
03481         
03482         if (previous != NULL)
03483         {
03484             relinkNodes(rgi, previous);
03485         }
03486         previous = rgi;
03487     }
03488     
03489     verifyMultiResolutionLinks(rg, 0);
03490     
03491     MEM_freeN(data);
03492 
03493     /* no need to load the editmesh back into the object, just
03494      * free it (avoids ngon conversion issues too going back the other way) */
03495     free_editMesh(em);
03496     MEM_freeN(em);
03497     
03498     return rg;
03499 #endif
03500 }
03501 
03502 #if 0

03504 ReebGraph *BIF_ReebGraphFromEditMesh(void)
03505 {
03506     EditMesh *em = G.editMesh;
03507     EdgeIndex indexed_edges;
03508     VertexData *data;
03509     ReebGraph *rg = NULL;
03510     
03511     if (em == NULL)
03512         return NULL;
03513 
03514     data = allocVertexData(em);
03515 
03516     buildIndexedEdges(em, &indexed_edges);
03517     
03518     if (weightFromDistance(em, &indexed_edges) == 0)
03519     {
03520         error("No selected vertex\n");
03521         freeEdgeIndex(&indexed_edges);
03522         freeEdgeIndex(&indexed_edges);
03523         return NULL;
03524     }
03525
