03527 
03528     if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_HARMONIC)
03529     {
03530         weightToHarmonic(em, &indexed_edges);
03531     }
03532     
03533     freeEdgeIndex(&indexed_edges);
03534     
03535 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
03536     weightToVCol(em, 1);
03537 #endif
03538     
03539     rg = generateReebGraph(em, G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_resolution);
03540 
03541 
03542     /* Remove arcs without embedding */
03543     filterNullReebGraph(rg);
03544 
03545     /* smart filter and loop filter on basic level */
03546     filterGraph(rg, SKGEN_FILTER_SMART, 0, 0);
03547 
03548     repositionNodes(rg);
03549 
03550     /* Filtering might have created degree 2 nodes, so remove them */
03551     removeNormalNodes(rg);
03552     
03553     joinSubgraphs(rg, 1.0);
03554 
03555     BLI_buildAdjacencyList((BGraph*)rg);
03556     
03557     /* calc length before copy, so we have same length on all levels */
03558     BLI_calcGraphLength((BGraph*)rg);
03559     
03560     filterGraph(rg, G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options, G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_threshold_internal, G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_threshold_external);
03561 
03562     finalizeGraph(rg, G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_postpro_passes, G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_postpro);
03563 
03564 #ifdef DEBUG_REEB
03565     REEB_exportGraph(rg, -1);
03566     
03567     arcToVCol(rg, em, 0);
03568     //angleToVCol(em, 1);
03569 #endif
03570 
03571     printf("DONE\n");
03572     printf("%i subgraphs\n", BLI_FlagSubgraphs((BGraph*)rg));
03573     
03574     MEM_freeN(data);
03575 
03576     return rg;
03577 }
03578 
03579 void BIF_GlobalReebFree()
03580 {
03581     if (GLOBAL_RG != NULL)
03582     {
03583         REEB_freeGraph(GLOBAL_RG);
03584         GLOBAL_RG = NULL;
03585     }
03586 }
03587 
03588 void BIF_GlobalReebGraphFromEditMesh(void)
03589 {
03590     ReebGraph *rg;
03591     
03592     BIF_GlobalReebFree();
03593     
03594     rg = BIF_ReebGraphMultiFromEditMesh();
03595 
03596     GLOBAL_RG = rg;
03597 }
03598 
03599 void REEB_draw()
03600 {
03601     ReebGraph *rg;
03602     ReebArc *arc;
03603     int i = 0;
03604     
03605     if (GLOBAL_RG == NULL)
03606     {
03607         return;
03608     }
03609     
03610     if (GLOBAL_RG->link_up && G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_DISP_ORIG)
03611     {
03612         for (rg = GLOBAL_RG; rg->link_up; rg = rg->link_up);
03613     }
03614     else
03615     {
03616         i = G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_multi_level;
03617         
03618         for (rg = GLOBAL_RG; rg->multi_level != i && rg->link_up; rg = rg->link_up);
03619     }
03620     
03621     glPointSize(BIF_GetThemeValuef(TH_VERTEX_SIZE));
03622     
03623     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
03624     for (arc = rg->arcs.first; arc; arc = arc->next, i++)
03625     {
03626         ReebArcIterator arc_iter;
03627         BArcIterator *iter = (BArcIterator*)&arc_iter;
03628         float vec[3];
03629         char text[128];
03630         char *s = text;
03631         
03632         glLineWidth(BIF_GetThemeValuef(TH_VERTEX_SIZE) + 2);
03633         glColor3f(0, 0, 0);
03634         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
03635             glVertex3fv(arc->head->p);
03636             
03637             if (arc->bcount)
03638             {
03639                 initArcIterator(iter, arc, arc->head);
03640                 for (IT_next(iter); IT_stopped(iter) == 0; IT_next(iter))
03641                 {
03642                     glVertex3fv(iter->p);
03643                 }
03644             }
03645             
03646             glVertex3fv(arc->tail->p);
03647         glEnd();
03648 
03649         glLineWidth(BIF_GetThemeValuef(TH_VERTEX_SIZE));
03650 
03651         if (arc->symmetry_level == 1)
03652         {
03653             glColor3f(1, 0, 0);
03654         }
03655         else if (arc->symmetry_flag == SYM_SIDE_POSITIVE || arc->symmetry_flag == SYM_SIDE_NEGATIVE)
03656         {
03657             glColor3f(1, 0.5f, 0);
03658         }
03659         else if (arc->symmetry_flag >= SYM_SIDE_RADIAL)
03660         {
03661             glColor3f(0.5f, 1, 0);
03662         }
03663         else
03664         {
03665             glColor3f(1, 1, 0);
03666         }
03667         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
03668             glVertex3fv(arc->head->p);
03669             
03670             if (arc->bcount)
03671             {
03672                 initArcIterator(iter, arc, arc->head);
03673                 for (iter->next(iter); IT_stopped(iter) == 0; iter->next(iter))
03674                 {
03675                     glVertex3fv(iter->p);
03676                 }
03677             }
03678             
03679             glVertex3fv(arc->tail->p);
03680         glEnd();
03681 
03682         
03683         if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_DISP_EMBED)
03684         {
03685             glColor3f(1, 1, 1);             
03686             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
03687                 glVertex3fv(arc->head->p);
03688                 glVertex3fv(arc->tail->p);
03689                 
03690                 glColor3f(0.5f, 0.5f, 1);               
03691                 if (arc->bcount)
03692                 {
03693                     initArcIterator(iter, arc, arc->head);
03694                     for (iter->next(iter); IT_stopped(iter) == 0; iter->next(iter))
03695                     {
03696                         glVertex3fv(iter->p);
03697                     }
03698                 }
03699             glEnd();
03700         }
03701         
03702         if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_DISP_INDEX)
03703         {
03704             mid_v3_v3v3(vec, arc->head->p, arc->tail->p);
03705             s += sprintf(s, "%i (%i-%i-%i) ", i, arc->symmetry_level, arc->symmetry_flag, arc->symmetry_group);
03706         
03707             if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_DISP_WEIGHT)
03708             {
03709                 s += sprintf(s, "w:%0.3f ", arc->tail->weight - arc->head->weight);
03710             }
03711             
03712             if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_DISP_LENGTH)
03713             {
03714                 s += sprintf(s, "l:%0.3f", arc->length);
03715             }
03716             
03717             glColor3f(0, 1, 0);
03718             glRasterPos3fv(vec);
03719             BMF_DrawString( G.fonts, text);
03720         }
03721 
03722         if (G.scene->toolsettings->skgen_options & SKGEN_DISP_INDEX)
03723         {
03724             sprintf(text, "  %i", arc->head->index);
03725             glRasterPos3fv(arc->head->p);
03726             BMF_DrawString( G.fonts, text);
03727     
03728             sprintf(text, "  %i", arc->tail->index);
03729             glRasterPos3fv(arc->tail->p);
03730             BMF_DrawString( G.fonts, text);
03731         }
03732     }
03733     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
03734     
03735     glLineWidth(1.0);
03736     glPointSize(1.0);
03737 }
03738 
03739 #endif
